Re: Invitation to Walkathon – Swachhata Pakhwada 2025
body: Dear Students, This is a reminder to join the *Walkathon* tomorrow, *14th September 2025 (Sunday)*, from *7:00 AM – 8:30 AM*. The route will be *Hostel Circle → Main Gate → Hostel Circle*. - Attendance at the Main Gate closes at *7:45 AM*. - Strictly no transport allowed during the Walkathon. - NSS Volunteers will earn *Category 4 Hours*. - Limited slots (15–20) for *“Mission Clean Walk”* with bonus hours – first come, first serve. Let’s come together for a cleaner, greener campus. 🌱 Warm regards, *Team NSS, IIT Hyderabad* On Fri, Sep 12, 2025 at 10:16 PM NSS IIT Hyderabad wrote: > Dear Students, > > The National Service Scheme (NSS), IIT Hyderabad warmly invites you to > participate in a *Walkathon on September 14, 2025*, as part of the *celebration > of Swachhata Pakhwada*. This initiative highlights our collective > responsibility to maintain cleanliness and work towards a healthier, > sustainable future. > > *Theme:* *“**Cleanliness for a Sustainable Future: Every Step Counts**”* > > *Event Details:* > 📅 *Date:* Sunday, 14th September 2025 > ⏰ *Time:* 7:00 AM – 8:30 AM > 📍 *Route:* Hostel Circle → Main Gate → Hostel Circle > [image: image.png] > > Swachhata Pakhwada emphasizes the importance of cleanliness, hygiene, and > sustainable practices in our daily lives. Through this Walkathon, we aim to > raise awareness, inspire action, and reaffirm our commitment to building a > cleaner and greener environment. > > 🔔 *Important Notes:* > > - > > NSS Volunteers will be awarded Hours in *Category 4* for participation. > - > > Attendance will be taken twice – once near the Main Gate and once at a > designated location along the route. > - > > Participants must form a proper queue while giving attendance. Any > violation may result in zero or negative hours. > - > > Attendance at the Main Gate will be closed at *7:45 AM*. > - > > *Volunteers are strictly instructed not to use any form of transport > (bicycles, e-vehicles, buses etc.) during the Walkathon. Any violation will > result in negative hours being awarded.* > > 🌿 *Special Activity – “Mission Clean Walk”* > As a new initiative, a small group of *15–20 volunteers (on a first-come, > first-serve basis)* will be provided with garbage bags and gloves to > collect trash or waste along the walkathon route. This marks our first step > in combining the spirit of *Swachh Bharat Abhiyan* with the Walkathon. > > - > > Participants of this activity will be awarded *bonus NSS hours* in > addition to Walkathon hours. > - > > Collected waste will be deposited at a designated collection point > after the event. > - > > *Clear instructions regarding this special activity will be given at > the time of the event.* > > Let us come together for a cleaner, greener tomorrow. Your participation > is more than just a step—it’s a commitment to change. > > *Let’s make every step count! 🌱* > > Warm regards, > *Team NSS, IIT Hyderabad* > -- > ---------------------------Regards--------------------------- > [image: Photo] > > nss.iith.ac.in/ > National Service Scheme (NSS) > Indian Institute Of Technology, Hyderabad > +91 7013561424 | 9490313586, > +91 7396037140, +91 7702360623, +91 8247207978, +91 8919736038 > office.nss@iith.ac.in > [image: Banner] > [image: phone-icon] *NOT ME BUT YOU* [image: facebook icon] > [image: youtube icon] > [image: > linkedin icon] [image: > instagram icon] > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Your Gateway to Study Abroad – Scholarships & Opportunities Await!
body: Dear Students, *Take your ideas global!* The Office of Career Services and E-Cell, IIT Hyderabad are teaming up to help you *study at top universities abroad* and turn your vision into a global reality. *Did you know? *Most leading* tech CEOs *didn’t just stop at* engineering, *they strengthened their journey with* business programs *that helped them* think bigger, build teams, and scale ideas globally.* Join us for an *exclusive session* to explore how you can *study abroad across North America, Europe, and Asia, with $6 Million+ in scholarships available.* 💸 📅 *Date: *15th September (Monday) ⏰ *Time: *6:30 PM IST 📍 *Venue: *ALH2, IIT Hyderabad ✨ *Scholarships tailored for IIT Hyderabad students* ✨ *100% Application Fee Waivers* ✨ *Guidance on applications and global opportunities* ✨ *Insights on connecting education with entrepreneurial growth* 👉 *Register here:* seedglobal.io/0ba7bb550 👉 Check out the universities students have *attended with the help of SeedGlobal*: Universities List Thanks & Regards, Arin Aggarwal Career Cell Manager Office of Career Services, IIT Hyderabad Cell~ +91 7087850215 -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: [ICPC] 2025 Asia West Preliminary Round
from: "'Infero IIT Hyderabad' via Students, IIT Hyderabad" <students@iith.ac.in>
body: Hey everyone, We are glad to announce that ICPC is back with another set of contests this year. There are three regionals for this year - *Amritapuri*,* Chennai *and * Kanpur* and there will be a common preliminary round for these, tentatively scheduled on *October 11th, 2025.* Each team of *exactly three contestants* can participate in a *maximum of* *two regions*. If you have formed a team, please fill this form . If you do not have a team or if you are looking for more teammates, feel free to ask in the Infero WhatsApp group or the Infero Discord channel . Please fill the form latest by* 22 September 2025, 23:59*. Only one member per team needs to fill this form. Some important things to keep in mind: - After you fill the form, make sure that every member on the team creates an account *individually *on the official ICPC website with their institute email address if they have never created an account before. - *Do NOT register your team on the above website*. We will take care of registering your team. - Pay the fees for the rounds you are participating in *only after *we successfully register your team on the official ICPC website. Looking forward to a great participation! Regards, [image: https://infero.netlify.app/] infero.netlify.app Siddarth & Chaitanya Infero Heads The Algorithmic and Logical Reasoning Club 83284 52591 | 73919 05838 infero@gymkhana.iith.ac.in -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: ISRO : National Space Science Symposium (NSSS) 2026
body: Dear Students, ISRO offers opportunity for UG/PG students in science & technology to participate in a special student session in 23rd National Space Science Symposium (NSSS) 2026, at NESAC, Meghalaya, during February 23-27, 2026. Registration is extended till 30th September 2025. subject: Fwd: LLM API access for CS3530 Assignment 1
body: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Vignesh S Date: Sun, Sep 7, 2025 at 4:56 PM Subject: LLM API access for CS3530 Assignment 1 To: Hello, The access information and instructions for the LLM instance for your assignment 1 of the course is given below. *Access information (to be accessed only from the server):* - IP address : 192.168.50.142 - Port: 25000 *Instructions:* 1. Use HTTP requests to access the API 2. The LLM instance only supports up to 24 students at a given time. Therefore a reservation based mechanism is used. Format is given below. 3. Reserve the instance by sending a HTTP request to the url *http://{ip address}:{port}/reserve* containing a JSON body that has your roll number with "rollno" key as shown below. 4. Sample JSON for reservation: { "rollno": "cs24mtech12007" } 5. Each student gets upto 30 minutes at a time. Also the LLM reservation is voided after 5 minutes of idle time. 6. To generate a quiz, use the url *http://{ip address}:{port}/generate_quiz *with the JSON body as shown below. 7. A sample of generate quiz JSON is as follows: { "rollno": "cs24mtech12007", "messages": [ { "role": "system", "content": ( "You are a trivia generator. Given a genre, output exactly 10 multiple-choice " "questions. Each question must have 4 options (A, B, C, D) and one correct answer. " "Return ONLY valid JSON in the following format: " '{"questions":[{"q":"...","options":["A) ...","B) ...","C) ...","D) ..."],"a":"A"}, ...]}' ) }, { "role": "user", "content": f"Generate 10 MCQ trivia questions about science." } ], "temperature": 0.0, "max_tokens": 1200 } To avoid clashes in the server(192.168.50.111), please use the port numbers as follows for your server to listen to: - CS students : Last 5 digits of your roll numbers - EE students : Last 5 digits of your roll numbers + 1000 - ES students : Last 5 digits of your roll numbers + 2000 - MA students : Last 5 digits of your roll numbers + 3000 Please note that high load on the LLM instance significantly increases the query processing time. Last minute rush may lead to errors. Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Invitation to Walkathon – Swachhata Pakhwada 2025
body: Dear Students, The National Service Scheme (NSS), IIT Hyderabad warmly invites you to participate in a *Walkathon on September 14, 2025*, as part of the *celebration of Swachhata Pakhwada*. This initiative highlights our collective responsibility to maintain cleanliness and work towards a healthier, sustainable future. *Theme:* *“**Cleanliness for a Sustainable Future: Every Step Counts**”* *Event Details:* 📅 *Date:* Sunday, 14th September 2025 ⏰ *Time:* 7:00 AM – 8:30 AM 📍 *Route:* Hostel Circle → Main Gate → Hostel Circle [image: image.png] Swachhata Pakhwada emphasizes the importance of cleanliness, hygiene, and sustainable practices in our daily lives. Through this Walkathon, we aim to raise awareness, inspire action, and reaffirm our commitment to building a cleaner and greener environment. 🔔 *Important Notes:* - NSS Volunteers will be awarded Hours in *Category 4* for participation. - Attendance will be taken twice – once near the Main Gate and once at a designated location along the route. - Participants must form a proper queue while giving attendance. Any violation may result in zero or negative hours. - Attendance at the Main Gate will be closed at *7:45 AM*. - *Volunteers are strictly instructed not to use any form of transport (bicycles, e-vehicles, buses etc.) during the Walkathon. Any violation will result in negative hours being awarded.* 🌿 *Special Activity – “Mission Clean Walk”* As a new initiative, a small group of *15–20 volunteers (on a first-come, first-serve basis)* will be provided with garbage bags and gloves to collect trash or waste along the walkathon route. This marks our first step in combining the spirit of *Swachh Bharat Abhiyan* with the Walkathon. - Participants of this activity will be awarded *bonus NSS hours* in addition to Walkathon hours. - Collected waste will be deposited at a designated collection point after the event. - *Clear instructions regarding this special activity will be given at the time of the event.* Let us come together for a cleaner, greener tomorrow. Your participation is more than just a step—it’s a commitment to change. *Let’s make every step count! 🌱* Warm regards, *Team NSS, IIT Hyderabad* -- ---------------------------Regards--------------------------- [image: Photo] nss.iith.ac.in/ National Service Scheme (NSS) Indian Institute Of Technology, Hyderabad +91 7013561424 | 9490313586, +91 7396037140, +91 7702360623, +91 8247207978, +91 8919736038 office.nss@iith.ac.in [image: Banner] [image: phone-icon] *NOT ME BUT YOU* [image: facebook icon] [image: youtube icon] [image: linkedin icon] [image: instagram icon] -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Reg:Paradise Biryani Pilot Counter at Wet Canteen – Starting Tomorrow
body: Dear All, We are pleased to inform you that *Paradise Biryani* will be operating a *pilot counter* at *Wet Canteen – Shop No. 5*, starting from *13'th September 2025* . The counter will be open during *lunch and dinner hours*, offering a limited menu on a trial basis: - *Chicken Biryani* – ₹170 (520g with one piece) - *Mutton Biryani* – ₹200 (520g with four pieces) - *Veg Biryani* – ₹150 (500g including paneer) We invite everyone interested to kindly make use of this facility.Potential expansion of the service will be considered based on user feedback and overall response. Hostel Team छात्रावास समन्वय इकाई | Hostel Coordinating Unit मंडप ब्लॉक (टीटी रूम के बगल में) | Pavilion Block (Beside TT Room) भारतीय प्रौद्योगिकी संस्थान, हैदराबाद, कंडी - 502284 | IIT Hyderabad, Kandi - 502284 तेलंगाना, भारत। | Telangana, India. subject: Re: [Internship] Qualcomm | Interim Engineering Intern - Registration
body: Dear All, The *Online Assessment* *(OA)* for *Qualcomm* has been scheduled as part of the ongoing internship drive. The details are provided below: - *Date : Monday, 15th September, 2025.* - *Time : 8:00 PM - 9:30 PM* - At the time of the assessment, you will be provided with the test link corresponding *only* to the profile you have registered for, either SW or HW. - Venue details and seating arrangements will be shared in due course of time. subject: New announcement: "Practice problems updated. More will be…"
body: Notification settings CS5590/CS3390 New announcement Practice problems updated. More will be added soon. Please take simulations also seriously. Some of them will appear in your final coding exam. Notes is up-to-date Thanks to two students from tutorial, corrected two oversights: one in last problem in quiz 1 solutions, one in week3 solutions (same problem). No one approached me for the "if and only if" conditions for this problem. I have now included it in week3 solutions. If anyone is interested, we can discuss. See details Posted on 8:42 PM, Sep 12 (GMT+05:30) by Saketha Nath Jagarlapudi Google LLC 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043 USA This email was sent to you because you indicated that you'd like to receive email notifications from Google Classroom. subject: Fwd: Reliance Foundation Scholarships (2025-26)
body: Dear Students, Forwarded for your information. Interested and eligible students may apply. Others, please ignore this email. *Please note that the students can avail only a single scholarship from a single stakeholder for a given period of time (i.e. Institute Scholarship / NSP/ any government or private sponsored scholarship or any other financial assistance) and keep us informed while you are applying for any scholarship.* *Disclaimer : IITH is not related to this organisation or the scholarship schemes offered. You are, therefore, requested to check the authenticity of the organisation before applying.* Regards, Scholarships Team / छात्रवृत्ति टीम Academic Section/शैक्षणिक अनुभाग Room No. 004, Ground Floor/कमरा नंबर 004, भूतल Administration Block /प्रशासन ब्लॉक IIT Hyderabad/आईआईटी हैदराबाद Kandi, Sangareddy/कंडी, संगारेड्डी Telangana/तेलंगाना - 502284 Ph: 040 2301 6767 ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Reliance Foundation Scholarships < rf.ugscholarships@mail.reliancefoundation.org> Date: Fri, Sep 12, 2025 at 1:30 PM Subject: Reliance Foundation Scholarships (2025-26) To: Dear Sir/Madam, Greetings from Reliance Foundation! Thank you for your continued support in sharing our communications with students. We are *3 weeks away* from the application deadline, and we would appreciate if you can share the below *mailer *with all first year Postgraduate and Undergraduate eligible students. Kind Regards, Reliance Foundation Scholarships Team --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Dear Students, The Application deadline for the *Reliance Foundation Postgraduate Scholarships *and *Reliance Foundation Undergraduate Scholarships *is *4th October 2025.* We encourage you to submit your application as early as possible and not wait for the deadline. You can refer to the attached flyers for more details. Any other questions? Please text “hi” on WhatsApp to 7977 100 100, call our helpline on (011) 4117 1414 Any queries about *PG application* email us at RF.PGScholarships@reliancefoundation.org Any queries about *UG application* email us at RF.UGScholarships@reliancefoundation.org To find out more details on the eligibility requirements and more information on how to apply, visit our website at: www.scholarships.reliancefoundation.org . We look forward to receiving your application. User Awareness Programme on " Research with Impact with Oxford Journals"
body: Dear All: Greetings from INFLIBNET Centre, Gandhinagar! In collaboration with INFLIBNET Centre Gandhinagar, *Oxford University Press* is pleased to invite faculty members, researchers, students, and librarians to our upcoming session titled "*User Awareness Programme on Research with Impact with Oxford Journals.*" This session aims to guide participants through the Oxford Academic platform, helping them discover high-quality research articles and empowering them to embark on a meaningful and impactful research journey. We request you to please share this with the faculties, researchers , students for registration. *Session details:* *Date: Tuesday, 16 September 2025* *Time: 3:00 - 4:00 PM, IST* *Online Platform: Microsoft teams* Kindly click on the link below for registration. *Registration Link * ONOS Team, INFLIBNET Centre, Gandhinagar *With regards,* *Team KRC* -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: User Awareness Programme on "One Nation One Subscription (ONOS) with American Mathematical Society , Wednesday, 17 September 2025
body: Greetings from INFLIBNET Centre, Gandhinagar! The Government of India has initiated One Nation One Subscription (ONOS), a Central Sector Ministry of Education (MoE) scheme, to provide access to 13,000+ journals from 30 Publishers from January 2025 onwards. The INFLIBNET Centre, an IUC of UGC, Gandhinagar, has been entrusted as the scheme's Implementation Agency. It is pleased to announce that INFLIBNET Centre is organizing User Awareness Programme on "One Nation One Subscription (ONOS)" with American Mathematical Society on 17th September 2025 from 03:30 to 04:30 p.m. Please register to join the Webinar https://tinyurl.com/yeakc2fd For more details, you may contact the ONOS Team at Email: support@onos.gov.in Phone: 079-23268243/44 *ONOS Team,* *INFLIBNET Centre, Gandhinagar* *Regards,* Team KRC -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

Re: हिन्दी पखवाड़ा समारोह एवं प्रतियोगिताएँ - 2025 - के आयोजन के सन्दर्भ में | Regarding the organization of Hindi Pakhwada Celebrations and Competitions - 2025.
body: Dear All, *नमस्कार ! * *Please see the trailing mail. * *A Gentle reminder for the Hindi Pakhwada Celebrations & Competitions - 2025.* भारतीय प्रौद्योगिकी संस्थान, हैदराबाद में *दि. 15-09-2025 से 29-09-2025 तक* *हिन्दी पखवाड़ा समारोह* मनाया जाएगा | पिछली मेल के साथ हिन्दी पखवाडा समारोह का बैनर एवं हिन्दी पखवाड़े के दौरान आयोजित होने वाली प्रतियोगिताओं की समय-सूची भी संलग्न की गई है | सभी संकाय सदस्यों, कर्मचारियों एवं विद्यार्थियों से अनुरोध है कि वे इस अवसर पर आयोजित होने वाली प्रतियोगिताओं में अधिक से अधिक संख्या में उत्साहपूर्वक भाग लेकर इस समारोह को भव्य सफल बनाएँ | *All the faculty & staff members and students are requested to participate in all the competitions in large numbers. * *ध्यान दें : निम्नलिखित 3 प्रतियोगिताओं के लिए गूगल फॉर्म के माध्यम से नामांकन करना आवश्यक है | कृपया नीचे दिए गए लिंक के माध्यम से अपना नामांकन दर्ज करें। सारी जानकारी गूगल फॉर्म में दी गयी है | * * To participate in the below mentioned 3 competitions please register your nominations through below mentioned google form links. All details are given in the google form. * * 1. हिन्दी गीत-गायन प्रतियोगिता | Hindi Singing Competition Link :* https://forms.gle/hCwkRCvMn3vJjUqW6 * 2. हिन्दी भाषण प्रतियोगिता | Hindi Elocution Competition Link :* https://forms.gle/QBXVvQLWp3SAr5wp6 * 3. स्वरचित कविता पाठ प्रतियोगिता | Self-written Poetry competition Link :* https://forms.gle/bZ8bDLE7XN7oHuiEA *Note : Except the above mentioned 3 competitions all other competitions will be conducted in walk in mode. For more details please go through the Hindi Pakhwada Competition Schedule - 2025 in the trailing mail. * *धन्यवाद !* Thanks & Regards नवीन श्रीवास्तव | Naveen Srivastava हिन्दी प्रकोष्ठ | Hindi Cell *हमसे जुड़ें | Like, Follow & Subscribe us on:* * Twitter(X) Instagram * Facebook On Tue, Sep 9, 2025 at 7:06 PM हिन्दी प्रकोष्ठ Hindi Cell, IIT Hyderabad < office.hindicell@iith.ac.in> wrote: > प्रिय संकाय सदस्यों, साथियों एवं विद्यार्थियों, > > *नमस्कार ! * > > भारतीय प्रौद्योगिकी संस्थान, हैदराबाद में *दि. 15-09-2025 से 29-09-2025 > तक* *हिन्दी पखवाड़ा समारोह* मनाया जाएगा | इस मेल के साथ हिन्दी पखवाडा > समारोह का बैनर एवं हिन्दी पखवाड़े के दौरान आयोजित होने वाली प्रतियोगिताओं की > समय-सूची भी संलग्न की जा रही है | सभी संकाय सदस्यों, कर्मचारियों एवं > विद्यार्थियों से अनुरोध है कि वे इस अवसर पर आयोजित होने वाली प्रतियोगिताओं > में अधिक से अधिक संख्या में उत्साहपूर्वक भाग लेकर इस समारोह को भव्य सफल > बनाएँ | > > Hindi Pakhwada Celebrations will be organized in IITH from *15-09-2025 to > 29-09-2025.* Please find the attachment of the Hindi Pakhwada Celebrations > banner and the Hindi Pakhwada Competitions schedule to be organized during > the Hindi Fortnight celebrations. subject: Group Mediclaim & Students Safety Policy
Fwd: Guidelines for Semester-long internship - Reg.
body: Dear Students, Forwarded for your information and compliance please. Regards, Under Graduate Team/स्नातक टीम Academic Section/शैक्षणिक अनुभाग Room No. 004, Ground Floor/कमरा नंबर 004, भूतल Administration Block /प्रशासन ब्लॉक IIT Hyderabad/आईआईटी हैदराबाद Kandi, Sangareddy/कंडी, संगारेड्डी Telangana/तेलंगाना - 502284 Ph: 040 2301 6770 ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: UG Academic Office Date: Sat, Aug 16, 2025 at 4:02 PM Subject: Guidelines for Semester-long internship - Reg. To: B Tech 23 Cc: DR Academic , Suresh N , Faculty In-Charge Placements , Placement IIT Hyderabad < office.placement@iith.ac.in>, Internships IIT Hyderabad < office.internship@iith.ac.in>, Prasanna R L , Hemalatha S , Bhimaraju Hemalatha < hemalatha.b@admin.iith.ac.in>, Bhanu Modi Dear Students, Below are the guidelines for pursuing a BTech Semester-long internship at IITH, in accordance with Senate guidelines: *No Courses During Internship:* During the semester-long internship, no courses can be taken. *No Backlogs*: It is a prerequisite that there are no pending backlogs. *Industry Internship Letter:* You must obtain a letter from the industry where you will be interning, confirming that they will allow you to submit an internship report to the evaluation committee at IITH. *Tuition Fee:* Tuition fees will be applicable. For information regarding Hostel Fees and other related expenses, please get in touch with the Hostel Office. *Departmental Approval: *Approval from the department, including the Faculty Advisor (FA) and Department Undergraduate Committee (DUGC), is mandatory. *International Internship:* If your internship is outside India, further approval from the Dean of International Relations (Dean IR) is required. Upon approval from your department, the Academic office will forward the request to Dean-IR for approval. Please keep these guidelines in mind as you plan and proceed with your BTech Semester-long internship. *Procedure:* It is mandatory for the students to submit the following form *(Form-1)* and obtain the "NOC" *(No Objection Certificate)* from the Academic Section before joining the Internship: *Semester Long Internship Form-1* - To be submitted by the student to the Academic Section with the approvals from the Department (FA and DUGC) before applying to the Internship. *Semester Long Internship Form-2* - To be shared by the student with the Industrial Supervisor while attending the Internship or along with the NOC/Bonafide Certificate. *Semester Long Internship Form-3* - To be shared by the student with the Department FA & DUGC/HOD after the completion of the Internship. You can download the Internship Forms from the following link: https://www.iith.ac.in/academics/forms/ *Securing a No Objection Certificate (NOC) from the Academic Section is mandatory for pursuing the Semester Internship.* To obtain the NOC, please follow the guidelines. Regards, S Hemalatha Under Graduate Team/स्नातक टीम Academic Section/शैक्षणिक अनुभाग Room No. 004, Ground Floor/कमरा नंबर 004, भूतल Administration Block /प्रशासन ब्लॉक IIT Hyderabad/आईआईटी हैदराबाद Kandi, Sangareddy/कंडी, संगारेड्डी Telangana/तेलंगाना - 502284 Ph: 040 2301 6770 -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: New announcement: "Next Friday I have some important work…"

subject: Maitri Scholarship Awarded to Our First M.Sc. Medical Physics Student
body: Dear friends, I am delighted to inform you that Ms. Lakshmi Raja (mp22mscst14002), from the first batch of the M.Sc. in Medical Physics program, has been awarded the prestigious Maitri Scholarship. This highly selective scholarship, provided by the Government of Australia, will support her Ph.D. at The Australian National University (ANU) in Canberra. Ms.Raja will be working under the supervision of Prof. Patrick Kluth at the Research School of Physics, focusing on the detection of blood-based biomarkers for neurodegenerative diseases using solid-state nanopore sensing. This achievement is a great source of pride for the MSc program in the Medical Physics Program and highlights the success of the program. More details can be found via the following link: https://research.anu.edu.au/research-innovation-news/anu-researchers-receive-prestigious-maitri-grants-to-strengthen-australia . Let me congratulate Ms.Raja & Faculty coordinators, Medical Physics program on behalf of all of us and wish them all the best in their future endeavours. warm regards, Murty ************************************************ प्रो. बी.एस. मूर्ति/ Prof. B.S. Murty निदेशक/ Director भारतीय प्रौद्योगिकी संस्थान हैदराबाद, कंदी, संगारेड्डी-502284 Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad, Kandi, Sangareddy-502284 Email: bsm@iith.ac.in; director@iith.ac.in Phone: +91-40-2301 6002; +91-83310 36001 ************************************************ -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. subject: Reminder: Attempt TIC 2025 Round 1 - Quiz
body: General Tata Imagination Challenge 2025 Hi Chunduri Navyatha , Every idea needs a launchpad. For the Tata Imagination Challenge 2025 , it begins with Round 1 – the Tata Quiz. This is your first step toward bringing your idea to the stage it deserves. Round 1: Tata Quiz is already live – test your knowledge, showcase your speed, and secure your Participation Certificate. Quiz Details: Duration: 20 minutes Questions: 20 MCQs (60 seconds each) Scoring: Accuracy + Speed (faster completion gets ranked higher) Marking: No negative marking Before you attempt, brush up on the world of Tata: Tata Central Archives Tata Tomorrow University Official Tata Portal How to Attempt: Visit the [Opportunity Page – Click Here ] Click on the Verify/Play button under Round 1: Tata Quiz Follow the instructions to begin System & Proctoring Requirements: Laptop/Desktop with webcam & mic access (8GB RAM recommended) Stable internet (>10 Mbps) Install the Unstop SmartHire App (Windows/Mac only) Attempt in one uninterrupted sitting Full-screen mode, no tab switching or interruptions Face verification before and during the quiz Once started, the timer runs continuously. Ensure you’re prepared before beginning. Register now, attempt the Tata Quiz, and take your idea one step closer to the national stage. All the best, Team Tata Imagination Challenge 2025 View Opportunity Join our evergrowing unstoppable community Get the Unstop app Queries? We're just one email away: support@unstop.com © 2025 Unstop . All rights reserved

Re: Lunar Eclipse Observation Session
from: "'Cepheid Astronomy club' via Students, IIT Hyderabad" <students@iith.ac.in>
body: Dear Stargazers, Thank you for joining our Lunar Eclipse Observation Session! It was wonderful to witness this celestial event together. The photographs from the session are now available here: 👉 [Google Drive Link ] You’re also welcome to upload your own eclipse shots to the folder and explore contributions from others. We apologize for the delay in sharing these and appreciate your patience. Feel free to view, download, and share the pictures—don’t forget to tag our club if you post them! 🌙✨ You can join our social communities using the link in the signature below. Thank you once again for your enthusiastic participation. Stay tuned for more exciting observation sessions and events! Clear skies, [image: Photo] *CEPHEID* *The Astronomy Club* IIT Hyderabad cepheid@gymkhana.iith.ac.in +91 77383 50253 +91 76191 14781 On Sun, Sep 7, 2025 at 11:34 PM Cepheid Astronomy club < cepheid@gymkhana.iith.ac.in> wrote: > Greetings fellow stargazers! > > We have closed the session now as the eclipse is at peak and thus nothing > is visible. > Thank you for coming. The blood moon is visible with your naked eye, do > check it out! > > Clear skies, > [image: Photo] > > > > > > > > > *CEPHEID* > > > > *The Astronomy Club* > > IIT Hyderabad > > cepheid@gymkhana.iith.ac.in > > +91 77383 50253 > > +91 76191 14781 > > > On Sun, 7 Sept, 2025, 23:11 Cepheid Astronomy club, < > cepheid@gymkhana.iith.ac.in> wrote: > >> Dear stargazers, >> >> If you are not able to attend the event, take a moment to look up at the >> sky. The fully eclipsed blood moon is visible beautifully with naked eyes >> too! >> >> Clear skies, >> [image: Photo] >> >> >> >> >> >> >> >> >> *CEPHEID* >> >> >> >> *The Astronomy Club* >> >> IIT Hyderabad >> >> cepheid@gymkhana.iith.ac.in >> >> +91 77383 50253 >> >> +91 76191 14781 >> >> >> On Sun, 7 Sept 2025, 21:40 Cepheid Astronomy club, < >> cepheid@gymkhana.iith.ac.in> wrote: >> >>> Dear stargazers, >>> >>> Please join us at 10 pm under the 🌕 at C-block (MAE Dept) Terrace. >>> >>> Clear skies, >>> [image: Photo] >>> >>> >>> >>> >>> >>> >>> >>> >>> *CEPHEID* >>> >>> >>> >>> *The Astronomy Club* >>> >>> IIT Hyderabad >>> >>> cepheid@gymkhana.iith.ac.in >>> >>> +91 77383 50253 >>> >>> +91 76191 14781 >>> >>> >>> On Sat, 6 Sept 2025, 22:34 Cepheid Astronomy club, < >>> cepheid@gymkhana.iith.ac.in> wrote: >>> >>>> Dear Astronomy and Astrophysics Enthusiasts, >>>> >>>> We hope this email finds you well and full of curiosity about the >>>> mysteries of the universe! >>>> >>>> Prepare for a once-in-a-lifetime celestial show! Cepheid, the >>>> Astronomy Club of IITH, is excited to extend a special invitation to you >>>> for an exclusive observation session of the Total Lunar Eclipse, a rare >>>> event that will grace the night sky tomorrow, *September 7th, 2025*. >>>> Our telescopes will be aimed on the moon , providing stunning, >>>> close-up views. No prior knowledge is required, just bring your sense of >>>> wonder! >>>> >>>> Here are the details: >>>> >>>> - >>>> >>>> *Date:* Sunday, September 7, 2025 >>>> - >>>> >>>> *Venue:* C-Block Terrace >>>> - >>>> >>>> *Time:* 10:00 PM to 11:30 PM >>>> >>>> *Important Note on Timing:* >>>> >>>> - >>>> >>>> *Partial Eclipse Begins:* ~9:57 PM. >>>> - >>>> >>>> *Total Eclipse (Blood Moon) Begins:* ~11:00 PM. >>>> - >>>> >>>> *Maximum Eclipse:* ~11:41 PM >>>> >>>> We're thrilled at the prospect of taking a cosmic break with you. This >>>> is a perfect opportunity to step away from your studies and connect with >>>> the cosmos. subject: Fwd: Application Deadline: Live Project in Business Analytics
from: "'Finance and Consulting Club IIT Hyderabad' via Students, IIT Hyderabad" <students@iith.ac.in>
body: Dear students, Today is the last day to apply for the Finlatics Business Analytics program. *Thanks and Regards,* *Team FCC,* *Finance and Consulting Club,* IIT Hyderabad fcc@gymkhana.iith.ac.in | IIT Hyderabad ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Arpita Vashishth Date: Thu, 11 Sept 2025, 12:13 Subject: Application Deadline: Live Project in Business Analytics To: Dear IIT Hyderabad Students, As *today, 11.59pm *is the *deadline to apply* for the *Finlatics Business Analytics Experience Program*, please note: 1. *N**o prerequisites* or prior domain knowledge are required to participate in the program as it comes with *p**ersonalised guidance*, *mentoring *and *live sessions.* 2. If you have any upcoming *assignment,* *examination, *or personal commitment, you can pick a project start date *after* completing the same to help the project fit in with your schedule. 3. You will be *allowed a break* during the project tenure for any academic or personal commitment. You would also be *allowed a Project Extension *of an additional month in case you cannot complete it in the 2-month duration. 4. You can go over the project details using the copy of the mail below and apply for the project using the following link: https://www.finlatics.com/da_applications?src=iithyd 5. The* time commitment *required for the project is around 3-4 hours per week. We want to extend our thanks to the team at the* Indian Institute of Technology, Hyderabad *for their coordination of the application process. The first mail circulated at the campus is attached below. On Fri, 5 Sept 2025 at 14:36, Arpita Vashishth < arpita.vashishth@finlatics.com> wrote: > Dear IIT Hyderabad Students, > > > > We're pleased to extend applications for the *Finlatics Business Analytics > Experience Program*, an online *live project* that helps students learn & > gain experience in *Data Analytics* and *Forecasting Techniques* at the *SASTRA > University, Tamil Nadu*. > > > > This project is being run at leading campuses, including *IIT Bombay, IIT > Madras, IISc Bangalore,* and *BITS Pilani *among others. > > > *What You'll Learn:* > > > 1. Build interactive dashboards using real sales data. > > 2. Gain hands-on experience with* data-driven tools *to understand > profitability analysis and pricing decisions according to market > requirements > > 3. Explore forecasting techniques, including Linear Forecasting and Exponential > Smoothing > > 4. Learn & engage in *Predictive Modelling *& *Trend Estimation* on > real-time data to gain actionable insights > > 5. Apply *simulations *to profitability and pricing decisions on industry-specific > case projects. > > > > *What you'll Get:* > > > > 1. *Certificate of Work Experience *in* Business Analytics.* > > 2. *Letter of Recommendation *based on performance > > > > *Apply Here (2-3 mins):* > > https://www.finlatics.com/da_applications?src=iithy > > *N**o prerequisites* or prior domain knowledge are required to be a part > of the program. All necessary *training *will be imparted to the program. > > > *Project Duration: *2 months, 100% Online. > > > *Time commitment:* 3 - 4 hours per week > > > > *Project Start*: *Flexible*, based on student choice > > > > *Project Break & Extension*: Students will be eligible for a *break or > extension* during the project if needed for any *exams, assignments, *or > *personal* commitments. > > > If selected, the program has a minimal induction fee of Rs. 1999 / Rs. > 2999 (on student choice). > > > *Fee Waiver: *A *fee waiver *of *upto 15%* shall be given to all *Indian > Institute of Technology, Hyderabad *students on the abovementioned > minimal induction fee. > > > To be eligible for the waiver, kindly apply through the above-mentioned > link only. > > > Warm regards, > Team Finlatics > +91 9136072313 > > *Know more about us: **https://www.finlatics.com/ > * > > *Visit us on Linkedin: * > *https://www.linkedin.com/company/fincrux-enabling-insights/* > > > *Mumbai*: 903, Atrium 2, Andheri - Kurla Road > , > Andheri (E), Mumbai 400093 > > Gurgaon: 424A, Fourth Floor - Tower B3, Spaze I-Tech Park, Sohna Road, > Sector 49, Gurgaon 122018 > > > > > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: 「Order Busters」Invitation to Upcoming Company Session and Internship Application
body: Dear student, I am Nissan from Order Busters. Thank you very much for attending our recent company session. We truly appreciated the chance to meet you and share more about our work. I would also like to inform you that on September 24th, we will return to IITH together with other companies to host another company session. We would be delighted if you could join us again for this event. Additionally, please note that we will start accepting resumes through the internship portal after September 25th. We warmly welcome your application and look forward to reviewing it. Thank you again for your time and interest, and we hope to see you again soon. Best regards, Nissan Order Busters Inc.

subject: Regarding CA2050 Course Registration
body: Dear Students, The course CA2050 (Introduction to visual arts) -1 credit has been floated for the current July25-Dec25 semester. The course was initially opened only for 4th-year students and it is now enabled for *3rd year (2023* *batch*) & *4th year (2022) *students* till today, 05:00 PM*. The available slots are 30. Interested students may register within this time. *After the given deadline, the course will be enabled for 2nd-year students also.* As informed by the instructor, the classes will be conducted in a workshop mode *on 13th and 14th, from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM* (with a lunch break in between). *Further requests to add/drop the course after the provided timeline, will not be accepted..* Regards, Prasanna Under Graduate Team/स्नातक टीम Academic Section/शैक्षणिक अनुभाग Room No. 004, Ground Floor/कमरा नंबर 004, भूतल Administration Block /प्रशासन ब्लॉक IIT Hyderabad/आईआईटी हैदराबाद Kandi, Sangareddy/कंडी, संगारेड्डी Telangana/तेलंगाना - 502284 Ph: 040 2301 6770 -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

body: Hey Freshers, Had fun at the last Game Night? We did too — so we’re bringing it back! This round, along with *Tekken, Mortal Kombat, Cricket 19*, we’re also hosting a *FIFA tournament*. 📍 *Venue:* Tinkerers’ Lab Room 📅 *Date:* 12th Sep - Friday And yes, we know midsems are just around the corner. subject: Re: Internship Opportunity - Accenture
body: Dear All, If your name is not there in the list I have sent earlier, even though you have registered both on OCS and the company website, there was an issue with your PAN. If your PAN is not according to the company guidelines, your name would not have appeared. Since it is an accenture company guideline, I am extremely sorry but there is nothing that can be done by OCS or HR. On Wed, Sep 10, 2025 at 7:27 PM Sai Soham Venkata Mashetty wrote: > > Dear all, > Hr has not sent any details regarding the OA yet. I will forward it to > everyone right after hr sends it > > On Wed, Sep 10, 2025 at 2:30 PM Sai Soham Venkata Mashetty > wrote: > > > > Dear All, > > > > Accenture's online assessment will be conducted today. There will be a > > test window of approximately 12-16 hours, where you can attempt it at > > any time from anywhere. Further details window timings and links will > > be shared soon. Please find attached list of registered students > > > > On Wed, Aug 27, 2025 at 5:43 PM Sai Soham Venkata Mashetty > > wrote: > > > > > > Dear Students, > > > > > > Accenture has opened registrations for the Summer Internship Program for the 2027 pass-out batch (4-Year UG programs only). Please find below the details: > > > > > > Internship Details > > > > > > Duration: 2 Months (8 weeks) > > > Eligibility: Only 4-Year Undergraduate Programs, graduating in 2027 > > > > > > Registration Process > > > > > > Register using the link below and on the OCS website no later than 28th August, 11:55PM. > > > For Registration: Accenture Registration > > > > > > Ensure you use your correct email ID during registration. This is mandatory to receive interview links. > > > > > > Only students who register will be considered for the assessment and interview. > > > > > > Important: All candidates aspiring to participate in Accenture’s recruitment and selection process will need to have: > > > > > > > > > > > > A valid Adult PAN card or e-PAN card at the time of their registration with us > > > Minor PAN card will not be accepted > > > Adult PAN card with childhood photograph will not be accepted > > > Adult PAN card without candidate’s legal guardian or father name will not be accepted > > > Please enter the name as per your PAN Card (in case there is no last name on the PAN Card, please enter your first name twice on the portal) > > > Please enter the DOB as per your PAN Card > > > Please try to upload a high-resolution image of your PAN Card > > > Sharing, a helpful resource that provides a step-by-step guide on how to instantly get an e-PAN card. > > > > > > > > > Resource to apply for instant e-PAN: Video Guide > > > > > > Registered candidates will receive the link for assessments and interviews directly from Accenture > > > > > > Please go through the attachments carefully before applying. > > > > > > Warm regards, > > > Soham Mashetty > > > Internship Coordinator > > > Office of Career Services > > > 8143508800 > > > > > > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: 51st EPS conference- R S Anandu- Best poster
Bursary Award - APICAM Conference, Melbourne
body: Dear friends, I am delighted to inform you that Mr. Sahil Diwan, an IITH-Deakin joint ID-PhD student (id21resch11020) working under the supervision of Dr. Viswanath Chinthapenta, Mechanical & Aerospace Engineering, has been awarded a Bursary Award by Materials Australia for his presentation on Additive Manufacturing at the 4th Asia-Pacific International Conference on Additive Manufacturing. Let me congratulate Sahil and Viswanath on behalf of all of us and wish them all the best in their future endeavors. warm regards, Murty ************************************************ प्रो. बी.एस. मूर्ति/ Prof. B.S. Murty निदेशक/ Director भारतीय प्रौद्योगिकी संस्थान हैदराबाद, कंदी, संगारेड्डी-502284 Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad, Kandi, Sangareddy-502284 Email: bsm@iith.ac.in; director@iith.ac.in Phone: +91-40-2301 6002; +91-83310 36001 ************************************************ -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. subject: Dr. Amrita Datta awarded the Elizabeth Adiseshiah Award 2025
body: Dear friends, I am delighted to inform you that Dr. Amrita Datta, Department of Liberal Arts, has been selected for the Elizabeth Adiseshiah Award 2025. Constituted by the Malcolm and Elizabeth Adiseshiah Trust, the Elizabeth Adiseshiah Award is presented to a young scholar below the age of 45 for contributions to Development Studies. It consists of a Citation and a cash prize of Rs.1 lakh. Let me congratulate Amrita on behalf of all of us and wish them all the best in their future endeavours. warm regards, Murty ************************************************ प्रो. बी.एस. मूर्ति/ Prof. B.S. Murty निदेशक/ Director भारतीय प्रौद्योगिकी संस्थान हैदराबाद, कंदी, संगारेड्डी-502284 Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad, Kandi, Sangareddy-502284 Email: bsm@iith.ac.in; director@iith.ac.in Phone: +91-40-2301 6002; +91-83310 36001 ************************************************ - -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. subject: Re: Heal Out Loud - An Evening of Stories and Support
from: "'Sunshine IIT Hyderabad' via Students, IIT Hyderabad" <students@iith.ac.in>
body: Dear All, This is a gentle reminder about today's Heal Out Loud event at C block LH3. We are about to start. We kindly request you to please join as soon as possible. With Regards, Team - Sunshine On Wed, 10 Sept 2025, 10:25 Sunshine IIT Hyderabad, < office.sunshine@campus.iith.ac.in> wrote: > Dear All, > > Please note, the event Heal Out Loud will be on Wednesday(Today), > September 10th, 2025. Kindly read it as Wednesday instead of Tuesday > mentioned earlier. > With Regards, > Team - Sunshine > > > On Wed, 10 Sep 2025 at 09:57, Sunshine IIT Hyderabad < > office.sunshine@campus.iith.ac.in> wrote: > >> Dear IITH Community, >> >> On World Suicide Prevention Day, we believe in the power of our shared >> stories to create hope and connection. With this in mind, the Sunshine Club >> invites you to a special evening of courage centered around the theme *“Changing >> the Narratives”*: *Heal Out Loud.* >> >> This is a safe and supportive community space dedicated to sharing our >> life experiences and listening with compassion. It's a time to change the >> narrative around mental health by giving voice to our experiences and >> reminding ourselves that no one is alone in their struggles. >> >> *Event at a Glance* >> >> - >> >> *What:* *Heal Out Loud* (An Evening of Courageous Narratives) >> - >> >> *Date:* Tuesday, September 10th, 2025 >> - >> >> *Time:* 5:30 PM Onwards >> - >> >> *Venue:* C- LH3 >> >> *Why You Should Join Us* >> >> - >> >> *Share & Change the Narrative:* Your experience has the power to >> offer hope, challenge stigma, and show others they aren't alone. >> - >> >> *Listen & Support:* Be part of a compassionate community. Simply >> listening is a powerful act of solidarity and support. >> - >> >> *Build a Brave Space:* Your presence helps create a campus culture >> where it's okay not to be okay, and it's brave to talk about it. >> >> *Who is this for?* >> >> This evening is for everyone. Whether you have an experience to share, a >> poem to tell, or you simply wish to listen and be part of the community, >> you are essential. >> >> Every voice, every story, and every listener helps change the narrative. >> Let's come together to create a space of healing and hope. >> With Regards, >> Team - Sunshine >> > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

body: Gentle Reminder. body: Dear All: Greetings of the day! Please find the IITH highlights of August 2025. subject: Academic Policies - Feedback Form for Upcoming SUGC and SPGC Meetings & Information
from: "'Secretary, Academic Affairs' via Students, IIT Hyderabad" <students@iith.ac.in>
body: Dear All, I hope this email finds you well and thriving in your academic and personal pursuits. Many of you would have been facing a lot of problems with Academics due to any policy or problems with curricula. With a Senate Meeting coming up in this month, preceded by meetings with the Dean (Academics), SUGC and SPGC, I would like to collect information/feedback on various academic policies, confusions and issues faced. *What will the Academic Affairs Council do?* Based on the volume of feedback and feasibility of implementation, we shall forward the *relevant* suggestions to the aforementioned meetings. I will keep the student in the loop via the SUGC/SPGC Representative of your batch. The SUGC Representatives of UG 2022, 2023 and 2024 batches are selected and cc'd in this email; while the SPGC Representatives as well as the SUGC Representatives of UG 2025 and 5-year Dual Degree batch will be selected soon. Please note that we can not guarantee that we will propose every point given in feedback in the upcoming meetings due to time constraints, however, this academic year shall have three more Senate meetings and thus plenty of room to cover all the feedback. It will be dealt on the basis of importance/impact of the issue and demand by the student community. *Whom will my feedback be addressed to?* Some of the feedback will be routed directly to Dean, who will in turn direct the agenda he deems worthy to the SUGC/SPGC meeting for recommendation followed by approval in the Senate. The rest will be directed to the DUGC/DPGC of your respective department based on the nature of feedback; and you can see the output in the Senate Minutes after the Senate meeting next month. *Issues to Avoid Mentioning In The Form:* *Policies not dealt with by the Senate* 1. *Grade changes for a particular student:* This is dealt with by the instructor. 2. *Any financial/fee-related Issues:* This is only dealt with by the Senate - Section (B), in which Student Representatives are forbidden. 3. *Any AIIMS Portal Issues:* This is dealt with by the AIIMS Office. 4. *KRC, OCS, Gymkhana or Other Cell/Club/CR Council Related Issues:* This is not dealt with by the Senate. 5. *Changing Instructor/Grading Policy/Slot Changes of a Specific Course:* Dealt with by the instructor only. Failure to follow the above instructions would lead to non-consideration of your feedback. *Issues Encouraged:* Please have a look at the minutes of previous Senate meetings to have an understanding of what sort of issues are dealt with by the Senate. The link for this is present in my signature. I encourage you to fill out curriculum-related or policy-related issues (basically, anything covered by the Academic Handbook which requires changes). *Google Form Link * Note: You can also give feedback anonymously if you wish to. *Keeping You in the Loop:* If you want to know the position of your proposal in the form, please reply to this email. As the student group is large, I may not respond individually to each email on this, I request the respective SUGC/SPGC Representatives to respond if possible. In case you do not receive a response within a few days, you may reach out to me in the chat option given in mail. *Academic Queries:* In case of any academic query, you may always reach out to your *Class Representative* at any moment of time. In case of no response, the next point of contact would be, in order, the SUGC/SPGC Representative followed by Academic Affairs Secretary. We will redirect you to the appropriate authorities, if need be. *Sai Rishi Kasturi* Secretary of Academic Affairs Student Gymkhana 2025 - 2026 +91 94900 44323 Minutes of Senate Meetings -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Re: Microbiology-BT2040: Assessment 2
body: Dear all, This is a gentle reminder to please send your presentation slides (in PPT format) by *6:00 PM today, for* those you are presenting tomorrow. On Wed, Sep 3, 2025 at 2:51 PM Sandipan Ray wrote: > Dear All, > Please find attached the group details for Assessment 2. > > - *You need to present the topic assigned to your group (as a group)* > - *You need to prepare a PPT on the given topic (maximum seven slides)* > - *The maximum time for presentation is 7 minutes, followed by 2 > minutes of Q&A* > - *15 marks for presentation and 10 marks for Q&A* > > > Group Formation: 2 students (3 in the last one) in each group > One member from each group should present the PPT, but both members should > equally contribute to the preparation of the presentation (and approve the > PPT). The presenting person will be selected during the presentation, so > both members must be prepared. The Q&A session will involve the > non-presenting member of the group. > > *You must send your PPT to Mr. Saibal Saha at bt24resch11012@iith.ac.in > * *(TA of this course) at least one day before > your presentation date, keeping me in cc. You should also keep your group > partner(s) in cc while sending the PPT. If we do not receive the PPT by 6 > PM on the date before your presentation (such as 9th Sep, 6 PM is the > deadline for the 1st group), two marks will be deducted.* > > *I will not accept any request regarding a change of group or dates. * > > Best wishes, > Sandipan > > *----------------------------------------------------------------- * > > *Dr. Sandipan Ray, Ph.D., MRSB* > > > > > > > > > > *Assistant Professor and Group LeaderCircadian Rhythms and Disease Biology > LaboratoryDepartment of BiotechnologyIndian Institute of Technology > HyderabadKandi, Sangareddy 502285, Telangana, > IndiaEmail: sandipan.ray@bt.iith.ac.in Mob: +91 > 7439865060URL: www.circadianlab-iith.com > * > > & > > *Vice President * > > *Indian Society for Chronobiology (InSC)* > > > Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one > of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM. > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Re: Internship Opportunity - Accenture
body: Dear All, Accenture's online assessment will be conducted today. There will be a test window of approximately 12-16 hours, where you can attempt it at any time from anywhere. Further details window timings and links will be shared soon. Please find attached list of registered students On Wed, Aug 27, 2025 at 5:43 PM Sai Soham Venkata Mashetty wrote: > > Dear Students, > > Accenture has opened registrations for the Summer Internship Program for the 2027 pass-out batch (4-Year UG programs only). Please find below the details: > > Internship Details > > Duration: 2 Months (8 weeks) > Eligibility: Only 4-Year Undergraduate Programs, graduating in 2027 > > Registration Process > > Register using the link below and on the OCS website no later than 28th August, 11:55PM. > For Registration: Accenture Registration > > Ensure you use your correct email ID during registration. This is mandatory to receive interview links. > > Only students who register will be considered for the assessment and interview. > > Important: All candidates aspiring to participate in Accenture’s recruitment and selection process will need to have: > > > > A valid Adult PAN card or e-PAN card at the time of their registration with us > Minor PAN card will not be accepted > Adult PAN card with childhood photograph will not be accepted > Adult PAN card without candidate’s legal guardian or father name will not be accepted > Please enter the name as per your PAN Card (in case there is no last name on the PAN Card, please enter your first name twice on the portal) > Please enter the DOB as per your PAN Card > Please try to upload a high-resolution image of your PAN Card > Sharing, a helpful resource that provides a step-by-step guide on how to instantly get an e-PAN card. > > > Resource to apply for instant e-PAN: Video Guide > > Registered candidates will receive the link for assessments and interviews directly from Accenture > > Please go through the attachments carefully before applying. > > Warm regards, > Soham Mashetty > Internship Coordinator > Office of Career Services > 8143508800 > > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Fwd: Invitation to Participate in IIWCPC 2025 Sponsored by Jane Street Asia
from: "'Infero IIT Hyderabad' via Students, IIT Hyderabad" <students@iith.ac.in>
body: Hey everyone, Coding Club, IIT Guwahati is organizing IIWCPC, a knockout-style competitive programming competition. Please find details for the same below and register for the event before the deadline mentioned on their website. [image: https://infero.netlify.app/] infero.netlify.app Siddarth & Chaitanya Infero Heads The Algorithmic and Logical Reasoning Club 83284 52591 | 73919 05838 infero@gymkhana.iith.ac.in ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Coding Club IIT Guwahati Date: Wed, Sep 10, 2025 at 12:52 AM Subject: Invitation to Participate in IIWCPC 2025 Sponsored by Jane Street Asia To: infero@gymkhana.iith.ac.in Cc: ADITYA SAMAL Coding Club IIT Guwahati is excited to announce the *India International Women's Competitive Programming Championship (IIWCPC) 2025*, sponsored by *Jane Street Asia*. This is a nationwide competitive programming championship with two tracks: - *Women Only Track* – 32 Finalists - *Open For All Track* – 8 Finalists The finalists will be invited to *Ethos 2025* at IIT Guwahati, one of the most beautiful campuses in India. Winners will share a *total prize pool of ₹1.5 Lakhs*. This is a fantastic opportunity for students to *showcase their programming skills*, gain recognition, and get noticed by top tech companies. *Register here:* https://iiwcpc.stemvibe.org/ If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us at *codingclub@iitg.ac.in *. Don’t miss this chance to compete and shine at IIWCPC 2025! -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Re: Heal Out Loud - An Evening of Stories and Support
from: "'Sunshine IIT Hyderabad' via Students, IIT Hyderabad" <students@iith.ac.in>
body: Dear All, Please note, the event Heal Out Loud will be on Wednesday(Today), September 10th, 2025. Kindly read it as Wednesday instead of Tuesday mentioned earlier. With Regards, Team - Sunshine On Wed, 10 Sep 2025 at 09:57, Sunshine IIT Hyderabad < office.sunshine@campus.iith.ac.in> wrote: > Dear IITH Community, > > On World Suicide Prevention Day, we believe in the power of our shared > stories to create hope and connection. With this in mind, the Sunshine Club > invites you to a special evening of courage centered around the theme *“Changing > the Narratives”*: *Heal Out Loud.* > > This is a safe and supportive community space dedicated to sharing our > life experiences and listening with compassion. It's a time to change the > narrative around mental health by giving voice to our experiences and > reminding ourselves that no one is alone in their struggles. > > *Event at a Glance* > > - > > *What:* *Heal Out Loud* (An Evening of Courageous Narratives) > - > > *Date:* Tuesday, September 10th, 2025 > - > > *Time:* 5:30 PM Onwards > - > > *Venue:* C- LH3 > > *Why You Should Join Us* > > - > > *Share & Change the Narrative:* Your experience has the power to offer > hope, challenge stigma, and show others they aren't alone. > - > > *Listen & Support:* Be part of a compassionate community. Simply > listening is a powerful act of solidarity and support. > - > > *Build a Brave Space:* Your presence helps create a campus culture > where it's okay not to be okay, and it's brave to talk about it. > > *Who is this for?* > > This evening is for everyone. Whether you have an experience to share, a > poem to tell, or you simply wish to listen and be part of the community, > you are essential. > > Every voice, every story, and every listener helps change the narrative. > Let's come together to create a space of healing and hope. > With Regards, > Team - Sunshine > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Re: Join The Sunshine Stride: A Morning Walk for Hope
from: "'Sunshine IIT Hyderabad' via Students, IIT Hyderabad" <students@iith.ac.in>
body: Hi Everybody, This is a gentle reminder about Sunshine's morning walk event called Sunshine Strides happening today. We will start the walk at 6am from the Hostel Circle. For more details you may refer to the attached poster and route map. We look forward to seeing you there With Regards, Team - Sunshine On Tue, 9 Sept 2025, 10:11 Sunshine IIT Hyderabad, < office.sunshine@campus.iith.ac.in> wrote: > Dear IITH Community, > > As part of Suicide Prevention Week, Sunshine, the Counselling cell of IITH > invites you to our morning walk event, *The Sunshine Stride*. This is > more than just a walk; it's a chance to come together as a community, > promote well-being, and show support for mental health awareness. > > *Why Join the Stride?* > > *Start with Hope*: Begin the day with a positive, collective action. > > *Stand in Solidarity*: Show your support for creating a compassionate > campus. > > *Connect with the Community*: Walk alongside friends, colleagues, and > fellow community members. > > *Boost Your Well-Being*: Enjoy a refreshing start to your day with some > gentle morning exercise. > > *Event at a Glance* > > *Event:* Sunshine Strides > > *Date: *Wednesday, September 10th > > *Time:* 6:00 AM > > *Starting Point*: Hostel Circle > > *Route*: From Hostel Circle to the IITH Main Gate. The route map is > attached for your reference > > This walk is open to all students, faculty, and staff. To help us plan, we > encourage you to register in advance here: To register, please Click here > > We will also have on-the-spot registrations at the starting point for > those who decide to join in the morning. > > Let’s take steps together towards hope. We look forward to seeing you > there. > > With Regards, > Team - Sunshine > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Data Analyst: 2025 Winter Internship AGC
body: Dear Students, Please find below some additional clarifications (beyond the information already shared) in response to common queries received: 1. *Stipend*: This is a paid internship offering *₹40,000 per month*, with a *Pre-Placement Offer (PPO)* opportunity based on performance. 2. *Travel Support*: Travel expenses for the 1-week *immersion program in Gurugram* will be covered by the company with housing support. 3. *Tentative Duration*: ~*8th Dec 2025 to *~*14th Feb 2026*. 4. *Work Mode & Schedule*: The internship is *remote*. During the vacation period, students are expected to work *full-time*. Once the academic session begins, students may *mutually coordinate *with the company to adjust working hours so that academic commitments are not affected. 5. *Eligibility*: Open to students from *all branches*, preferably those with relevant *skills or interest* in: Python, Machine Learning, Analytics, Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence *Note*: As our institute does not have an official Winter Internship policy, students *must obtain* *prior approvals from DUGC/ DPGC and HoD* before applying. The Office of Career Services (OCS) is only facilitating this opportunity with our students and does not handle approvals. *~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~* *PLACEMENT CELL* *Office of Career Services (OCS)* *# 313, 3rd Floor, Academic Block "B"* *Phone No. : 2301 6810* *Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad* *Kandi, Sangareddy, Telangana 502 284* -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Re: INTER IIT 🏆💪: Musical Events Auditions

subject: KRC: Revised Library Timings w.e.f September 15, 2025-reg / संशोधित पुस्तकालय समय
body: Greetings from IITH-KRC/Library !!! Dear All, We are pleased to inform you about the revised timings of the Knowledge Resource Centre (KRC)/Library, as outlined below, w.e.f.* September 15, 2025* for the IITH community. Please note the following revised library timings and their services as below: Name of the Service/Facility Timings Monday to Friday Ground Floor - Reading Area (after 1.50 am) 24x5 (except weekend/holidays)* All Reading Areas (GF, FF, SF & SF)** 9:00 AM - 01:50 AM Circulation Section (Issue and Return of Books) 9:00 AM - 20:30 PM Photocopy / Printing Service (GF) 9:00 AM - 20:30 PM Group Discussion Rooms (TF) access 9:00 AM - 01:00 AM Reference Section (SF) 9:00 AM - 01:50 AM Cyber Library (FF) - Learning Commons Lab-1 9:00 AM - 11:00 PM Cyber Library (FF) - Research Commons Lab-2 9:00 AM - 20:30 PM AV Room / Seminar Room / VC Room As per bookings (up to 20:30 PM only) *Saturday, Sunday and Institute Holidays All Reading Areas 9:00 AM - 2:00 AM (17 hours) **GF-Ground Floor, FF-First Floor; SF-Second Floor; TF-Third Floor Note: Please be aware that any misuse of these extended facilities may result in restricted access to the Library. We therefore urge all users to follow and abide by the KRC/LIBRARY RULES carefully. We encourage you to fully utilise the extended hours and enhanced library services to support your teaching, learning, and research activities. For detailed information about the KRC, its facilities, and services, please refer to KNOW YOUR KRC . This issues are with the approval of the competent authority. Happy Reading !!! सादर धन्यवाद | Thanks & Regards Bhojaraju Ph.D., MLISc, PGDLAN | Endeavour Research Fellow (Australia) ----------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------ -------------------------------------------------------- *Explore KRC: * *Website | Catalog |RAIITH | E-Resources | Search **|Pragyaan * *Connect KRC: * LinkedIn | Facebook | X-Tweets | Instagram | YouTube *डॉ. भोजराजू **गुंजाल* / *Dr. Bhojaraju Gunjal *मुख्य पुस्तकालय अधिकारी / Chief Library Officer, ज्ञान संसाधन केंद्र / Knowledge Resource Centre (KRC-Library) भारतीय प्रौद्योगिकी संस्थान हैदराबाद, कंधी, संगारेड्डी-502284 *Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad*, Kandi, Sangareddy-502284. E-mail: bhojaraju.g@admin.iith.ac.in | librarian@iith.ac.in Phone: +91-40-23016085 (O) Connect: [image: ORCID] | [image: Scholar] | [image: BePress] | [image: Publications List] | [image: Publons] | [image: IRINS] | [image: Profile] ----------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------ -------------------------------------------------------- -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. subject: Registration for ServiceNow Virtual Mock Interviews – Sept 13
body: Dear Students, As part of ongoing engagement with our campus, *ServiceNow* is pleased to host *Virtual Mock Interviews* on *Saturday, 13th September 2025*. This initiative will provide a realistic interview experience, focusing on both technical and communication skills, and will help students prepare more effectively for future opportunities. *Details:* - *Date:* Saturday, 13th September 2025 - *Time:* 1:15 PM – 2:15 PM - *Mode:* Virtual (Zoom link will be shared after registration) - *Audience:* 2027 Graduates - *Slots Available:* 18 students Students who are *genuinely interested and confirmed about their availability* for the session are requested to register using the link below by *today, 9:00 PM*. Final participants will be shortlisted by ServiceNow. Form Link : https://forms.gle/KYEtvRSA54wgmsjQ9 -- *Thanks and Regards,Shubham Nare* Internship Coordinator, Office of Career Services, Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad, Phone : +91 7249792394 Email : ic23btech11020@iith.ac.in -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. subject: Data Analyst: 2025 Winter Internship AGC
body: Dear Students, We are pleased to share an exciting *Winter Internship* opportunity with *AGC Asia Pacific*, a company that recently participated in *Japan Career Day 2025*. *About the Internship:* - *Role:* Data Analyst Intern - *Number of positions:* 10 - *Mentorship:* - 6 interns will be mentored by experienced Indian professionals - 4 interns will receive guidance from distinguished Japanese experts - *Exposure:* - Remote internship with a *one-week immersive visit* to the Gurugram office - Direct interaction with the Japanese team - *Duration:* 2 months of hands-on project work and professional mentorship - *Eligibility:* - 1st-year Master’s students (graduating in 2027) - 2nd-year Master’s RA students (graduating in Dec 2026) - 3rd-year Bachelor’s students (graduating in 2027) - *Branch restrictions:* None *Application Process:* Interested students are requested to fill out the *Google Form* to apply. It is mandatory to have DUGC/DPGC as well as HoD approval before applying. *Deadline to Apply:* September 12, *(12 noon)* Feel free to reach at +91 9421674592 or gs24mtech11014@iith.ac.in (Sumedh Ayachit) for any queries. Thanks & regards, Sumedh Ayachit -- *~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~* *PLACEMENT CELL* *Office of Career Services (OCS)* *# 313, 3rd Floor, Academic Block "B"* *Phone No. : 2301 6810* *Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad* *Kandi, Sangareddy, Telangana 502 284* -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: INTER IIT SELECTIONS - QUIZ
from: "'Literary Society IITH' via Students, IIT Hyderabad" <students@iith.ac.in>
body: Greetings from the Quiz Club! We are recruiting members for the Quiz Contingent for the *Inter IIT Cultural Meet, *scheduled this December. Selections will be done on the basis of a quiz, on *10th September 2025*. The quiz will have sections on all the different categories of quizzes conducted at Inter IIT: 1. General 2. MELA - Music, Entertainment, Literature and Arts 3. Sports 4. India 5. TLC - Travel, Lifestyle and Culture 6. Sci-Biz-Tech - Science, Business and Technology If you feel like your trivia is good in even one of these categories, make sure to showcase it in the quiz! You can participate in the quiz *in teams of up to 3 members.* This is the perfect opportunity to represent IIT Hyderabad on the national stage, don't miss it! *What : Inter IIT Selection Quiz * *Date : 10th September 2025 (Wednesday)* *Time : 9 PM onwards* *Venue : A LH 1* Please bring your own papers and pens! Hope to see you all there, Regards, Quiz Club -- ------------------------------------------------------------------ WhatsApp - WhatsApp Community Blog - The Lexicon IITH Discord - https://discord.gg/j6aTYMe Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/litsoc_iith/ Magazine - https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1jcmqqtMsQxYBP9pxlcuJK82Pwxw-DE5E?usp=sharing ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Ready to take off? Start with the Tata Quiz – Round 1
body: General Tata Imagination Challenge 2025 Hi Chunduri Navyatha , Every idea needs a launchpad. For the Tata Imagination Challenge 2025 , it begins with Round 1 – the Tata Quiz. This is your first step toward bringing your idea to the stage it deserves. Round 1: Tata Quiz is live – test your knowledge, showcase your speed, and secure your Participation Certificate. Quiz Details: Duration: 20 minutes Questions: 20 MCQs (60 seconds each) Scoring: Accuracy + Speed (faster completion gets ranked higher) Marking: No negative marking Before you attempt, brush up on the world of Tata: Tata Central Archives Tata Tomorrow University Official Tata Portal How to Attempt: Visit the [Opportunity Page – Click Here ] Click on the Verify/Play button under Round 1: Tata Quiz Follow the instructions to begin System & Proctoring Requirements: Laptop/Desktop with webcam & mic access (8GB RAM recommended) Stable internet (>10 Mbps) Install the Unstop SmartHire App (Windows/Mac only) Attempt in one uninterrupted sitting Full-screen mode, no tab switching or interruptions Face verification before and during the quiz Once started, the timer runs continuously. Ensure you’re prepared before beginning. Register now, attempt the Tata Quiz, and take your idea one step closer to the national stage. All the best, Team Tata Imagination Challenge 2025 View Opportunity Join our evergrowing unstoppable community Get the Unstop app Queries? We're just one email away: support@unstop.com © 2025 Unstop . All rights reserved

subject: Fwd: Live Project in Business Analytics
from: "'Finance and Consulting Club IIT Hyderabad' via Students, IIT Hyderabad" <students@iith.ac.in>
body: Dear Community, Please Find the details regarding the application for the Live project opportunity by Finlatics in Business Analytics. Best regards, Team FCC *Thanks and Regards,* *Team FCC,* *Finance and Consulting Club,* IIT Hyderabad fcc@gymkhana.iith.ac.in | IIT Hyderabad ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Arpita Vashishth Date: Fri, 5 Sept 2025, 14:36 Subject: Live Project in Business Analytics To: Dear IIT Hyderabad Students, We're pleased to extend applications for the *Finlatics Business Analytics Experience Program*, an online *live project* that helps students learn & gain experience in *Data Analytics* and *Forecasting Techniques* at the *SASTRA University, Tamil Nadu*. This project is being run at leading campuses, including *IIT Bombay, IIT Madras, IISc Bangalore,* and *BITS Pilani *among others. *What You'll Learn:* 1. Build interactive dashboards using real sales data. 2. Gain hands-on experience with* data-driven tools *to understand profitability analysis and pricing decisions according to market requirements 3. Explore forecasting techniques, including Linear Forecasting and Exponential Smoothing 4. Learn & engage in *Predictive Modelling *& *Trend Estimation* on real-time data to gain actionable insights 5. Apply *simulations *to profitability and pricing decisions on industry-specific case projects. *What you'll Get:* 1. *Certificate of Work Experience *in* Business Analytics.* 2. *Letter of Recommendation *based on performance *Apply Here (2-3 mins):* https://www.finlatics.com/da_applications?src=iithy *N**o prerequisites* or prior domain knowledge are required to be a part of the program. All necessary *training *will be imparted to the program. *Project Duration: *2 months, 100% Online. *Time commitment:* 3 - 4 hours per week *Project Start*: *Flexible*, based on student choice *Project Break & Extension*: Students will be eligible for a *break or extension* during the project if needed for any *exams, assignments, *or *personal* commitments. If selected, the program has a minimal induction fee of Rs. 1999 / Rs. 2999 (on student choice). *Fee Waiver: *A *fee waiver *of *upto 15%* shall be given to all *Indian Institute of Technology, Hyderabad *students on the abovementioned minimal induction fee. To be eligible for the waiver, kindly apply through the above-mentioned link only. Warm regards, Team Finlatics +91 9136072313 *Know more about us: **https://www.finlatics.com/ * *Visit us on Linkedin: * *https://www.linkedin.com/company/fincrux-enabling-insights/* *Mumbai*: 903, Atrium 2, Andheri - Kurla Road , Andheri (E), Mumbai 400093 Gurgaon: 424A, Fourth Floor - Tower B3, Spaze I-Tech Park, Sohna Road, Sector 49, Gurgaon 122018 -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

Re: Shiksha Sankalp Excellence Award for undergraduate Female marginalized and specially-abled (girl students)
body: Dear Students, Reference the trailing mail, this is a gentle reminder to apply for this excellence award. Eligibility: The award is for the girl students admitted into the first semester of their undergraduate program and the primary objective is to provide financial support to the undergraduate female marginalized students (Economically Weaker Sections) as well as specially-abled (PwD) (girl students) at IIT Hyderabad by covering their Hostel and Mess Fee. If you meet the eligibility criteria and are interested, please submit your application before the deadline. Click here for detailed information and to apply: https://forms.gle/JRKzcdor2Te9nVhD8 Do reach out to office.ar@iith.ac.in with a copy to Dean.acr@iith.ac.in for any queries. Thanks and regards Team ACR On Wed, Sep 3, 2025 at 4:22 PM Alumni Relations Office wrote: > Dear Students, > > The office of Alumni and Corporate Relations is pleased to roll out the > "Shiksha Sankalp Excellence Award". The primary objective is to provide > sustainable financial support to *undergraduate female marginalized > students (Economically Weaker Sections) as well as specially-abled (PwD) **(girl > students)* at IIT Hyderabad. > > This excellence award specifically focuses to assist students by covering > their Hostel and Mess Fee. Additionally, the award is for the girl students > admitted into the *first semester of their undergraduate program*. > > Detailed information is provided in the below form, kindly go through the > form and submit your responses if you are interested and eligible. > > Click to Apply: https://forms.gle/JRKzcdor2Te9nVhD8 > > Do reach out to office.ar@iith.ac.in with a copy to Dean.acr@iith.ac.in > for any queries. > > Thanks and regards > Team ACR > -- Thanks & Regards, -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Fwd: Hackathon Submission Deadline Approaching Soon!
body: *~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~* *PLACEMENT CELL* *Office of Career Services (OCS)* *# 313, 3rd Floor, Academic Block "B"* *Phone No. : 2301 6810* *Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad* *Kandi, Sangareddy, Telangana 502 284* ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Nallas Hackathon Date: Mon, Sep 8, 2025 at 11:05 AM Subject: Hackathon Submission Deadline Approaching Soon! To: Team Nallas Hackathon [image: https://campaign-image.com/zohocampaigns/174213000013650240_zc_v30_1604568465875_welcome26_banner.png] Hi , This is a reminder that the *submission deadline for Round 1 of the Nallas CodeXcelerate Hackathon 2025 is fast approaching.* We invite your students to take this opportunity to showcase their talent, creativity, and problem-solving skills. This hackathon is a gateway for your students to gain *industry recognition, certificates, prizes, and potential career opportunities* with Nallas Technologies. CLICK HERE TO REGISTER *SEND YOUR SUBMISSION TO US VIA EMAIL ID TO Hackathon@nallas.com OR CLICK HERE * FOR MORE DETAILS CLICK HERE. [image: Hackthon] *Deadline for submissions: 14th September, 11:59 PM* We request your support in encouraging maximum participation from your students so they don’t miss out on this unique platform. For any queries or further information, please contact us at Hackathon@nallas.com We look forward to your institution’s participation and to building a meaningful collaboration. Let’s innovate, collaborate, and make an impact together! Thank you for your attention. Best regards, Team Nallas Hackathon www.nallas.com Follow Us On [image: LinkedIn] [image: Youtube] [image: Instagram] You are receiving this email because your institution was invited to participate in *Nallas Hackathon 2025*. Have questions or need assistance? You can contact us at *Hackathon@nallas.com* If you wish to unsubcribe Click Here -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.
