subject: Re: Register for Cisco Summer Internship Program – Batch of 2027
body: Dear Students, Cisco has sent *Online Assessment (OA) invitations via HackerRank* to all eligible students on their registered email IDs. 📌 *Important Note:* - If you did not receive the mail, it could be due to *wrong email ID, academic arrears, or not being of Indian nationality*. - Please *check your Spam/Junk folders* as well. 📝 *Assessment Details:* - *Date:* 03 September 2025 - *Start Time:* 08:00 PM - *End Time:* 09:30 PM - *Duration:* 90 minutes - *Platform:* HackerRank 📌 *Instructions for Students:* - The assessment will consist of coding-based questions; ensure that they have a stable internet connection throughout the assessment. - The use of any study material, mobile phones, electronic devices, media, or internet resources is not - allowed during the test. - No calculators are allowed. Using a pen and paper is allowed during the test. - Please ensure that the students have a built-in camera on the system they are taking the test from. - The test will run on full-screen mode, please ensure that they do not exit the window, switch tabs as - this may flag as suspicious activity. - Any sort of copying, plagiarism, moving out of the tab/window, or malpractices will lead to disqualification. - The activity during the assessment, including code submissions and browser behaviour, may be - monitored for integrity checks. - Students should refrain from copying code from external sources. - Students should avoid switching between tabs or windows during the assessment. - Any detected irregularities may be subject to further review and could impact their assessment outcome. - Any unfair means used during the assessment will lead to elimination from the process and further - course of action will be taken against the student. - In case of a power cut or network disconnection, Please ask the student to resume/rejoin within 30 minutes, or else the test will be automatically submitted. - The test will automatically be submitted after 30 minutes of inactivity on the test screen. - To rejoin the test, the students should use the same email address used to register on HackerRank. 📌 *Seating Arrangement:* Seating arrangement details will be shared shortly. Best regards, *B.Lokesh Reddy* On Sat, Aug 23, 2025 at 8:49 AM Bolla Lokesh Reddy < cs23btech11011@iith.ac.in> wrote: > Final Reminder, > Submit the forms and ocs registration before the deadline. > > No extensions will be allowed. > > On Fri, 22 Aug, 2025, 11:18 pm Bolla Lokesh Reddy, < > cs23btech11011@iith.ac.in> wrote: > >> *Final Reminder* – Submit All 3 Cisco Internship Registrations 🚨 >> >> Dear All, >> >> 🔴 Please ensure you complete *all 3 steps* for Cisco Internship >> Registration before the deadline. >> >> 📌 *Deadline: 23rd August 2025, 10:00 AM* >> ⚠️ No extensions. Submissions after the deadline will NOT be accepted. >> >> On Thu, Aug 21, 2025 at 10:36 PM Bolla Lokesh Reddy < >> cs23btech11011@iith.ac.in> wrote: >> >>> Dear All, >>> >>> 🔴 This is the *final reminder* for the Internship Registration process >>> for *Cisco*. >>> >>> ⚠️ *Mandatory Requirements (Strict):* >>> >>> 1. >>> >>> *Company's Official Portal* >>> 2. >>> >>> *Google Form* >>> 3. >>> >>> *OCS Portal Registration* >>> >>> ✅ *If you have already filled the 2 forms, please ensure OCS Portal >>> registration is done before the deadline.* >>> ✅ *If you haven't filled out the forms until now, you must complete all >>> 3 steps.* >>> >>> 📌 *Final Deadline:* *23rd August 2025, 10:00 AM* >>> >>> 🔴 *No extensions will be given beyond this. Submissions after the >>> deadline will not be accepted.* >>> >>>> -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Thank You for Joining Ganesh celebration🙏✨
body: Dear Students, We hope you all enjoyed the *Ganesh Nimarjan Celebration* and the moments of devotion, joy, and togetherness it brought. It was wonderful to see such enthusiastic participation throughout the Ganesh Chaturthi celebrations. On behalf of the organizing team, I krishna vardhan sincerely thank each one of you for your support, contributions, and presence that made this celebration truly special. 🌸 To cherish these memories, we request you to kindly share the *photos and videos you captured during Ganesh Chaturthi* – your moments, your lens, your memories! 📸🎥 Please share them at: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1kf2mSSp1uc6v23crqnwnEriQv2BpjhHE?usp=drive_link Looking forward to reliving these beautiful memories together. *Jai Bappa Morya!* 🙌 Thanks & Regards ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ *Krishna Vardhan Pitla* *General Secretary-I* *Student Gymkhana 2025-26* *Mobile: ** 7989400829* -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. Your HackerRank FY26 | Cisco Day - Online Assessment | Summer Internship | 03 Sep 2025 Invitation
body: FY26 | Cisco Day - Online Assessment | Summer Internship | 03 Sep 2025 - powered by HackerRank Hi, Thank you for your interest in joining Cisco Systems Inc! We're excited to invite you to the next step in the process: the HackerRank FY26 | Cisco Day - Online Assessment | Summer Internship | 03 Sep 2025 assessment. This is a great opportunity to showcase your skills, and we're here to support you along the way. Here's what you need to know: Timeline: Please complete the assessment as per the timelines shared below. Practice Makes Perfect: To help you feel confident, we've included a sample test where you can explore the HackerRank environment and practice before starting the official test. A few tips for success: Create the Right Environment: Set up in a quiet, private space where you can focus. Understand Each Question: Take a moment to carefully read each question before diving in. Avoid Disruptions: Once you start, complete the test in one uninterrupted session. Avoid refreshing your browser or using the back button to prevent losing progress. Feel free to reach out to your recruiter if you have any questions. Wishing you the best of luck with the assessment—go show us your skills! Happy coding, The Cisco Systems Inc Hiring Team Recommended Browser: Google Chrome v101 or greater Duration: 90 min Start Login Date/Time: 3 Sep 2025 08:00 PM IST (Asia - Kolkata) End Login Date/Time: 3 Sep 2025 08:35 PM IST (Asia - Kolkata) Start Test You can also use this test link to access the test anytime before the test expiry date above. Please check date and time in your time zone. Please note once you begin the test the timer will start and the test cannot be paused. Hence it is highly recommended that you complete the test in one sitting. In case of power failure or loss of internet connection, the test timer will continue to run even though you might not be attempting it, in such a case please contact us by replying back to this email. For any technical queries, please refer to https://track.pstmrk.it/3ts/candidatesupport.hackerrank.com%2Fhc%2Fen-us%2Fcategories%2F4402828710675-FAQ/EDcI/EcW-AQ/AQ/fda9ca9e-417b-4ec5-83de-243916f53ebf/5/lX8LoS3q8X or contact us at https://track.pstmrk.it/3ts/customersupport.hackerrank.com%2Fhc%2Fen-us%2Frequests%2Fnew%3Fticket_form_id%3D360001035834./EDcI/EcW-AQ/AQ/fda9ca9e-417b-4ec5-83de-243916f53ebf/7/V9gt-iOWjx HackerRank only provides a platform to conduct the tests. It does not schedule or evaluate any hiring tests or conduct interviews for any company. Hence for any of the above requests please contact the company that sent you the invite.

Re: Inviting Applications for Sunshine UG Buddy Program 2025–26
body: Greetings from Sunshine, Hope this email finds you well. This is a gentle reminder to apply for the *UG Buddy Program 2025–26*. The last date to apply is *5th September 2025, 11:59 PM*. [Click here to fill out the UG Buddy Program Application Form] Looking forward to your participation. With Regards, Team - Sunshine On Sat, Aug 23, 2025 at 1:29 PM Sunshine IIT Hyderabad < office.sunshine@campus.iith.ac.in> wrote: > Greetings from *Sunshine*, > > Hope this email finds you well. We at Sunshine are excited to present the *Buddy > Program for UG Students 2025–26*. We invite you to join the program and > contribute uniquely to the IITH fraternity. > Who are Sunshine Buddies? > > Buddies are fellow students from various academic backgrounds who > volunteer to be your *go-to contact* for any assistance you may need. > They are approachable and ready to lend an empathetic ear, offering help on > social, mental, or academic fronts. > Benefits of becoming a Buddy: > > - > > *Personal Growth:* Enhance communication, empathy, and active > listening skills. > - > > *Networking & Connections:* Build relationships with volunteers, > mentors, and peers. > - > > *Personal Fulfillment:* Positively impact others’ lives and witness > their growth. > - > > *Certificate:* Receive an official certificate recognizing your tenure > as a Sunshine Buddy. > - > > * Buddy of the Month:* Each month, one buddy will be recognized with > this title. > > [Click here to fill out the UG Buddy Program Application Form] > > > *Deadline to apply: 5th September 2025, 11:59 PM* > > *Note:* > > - > > Each department should ensure *at least one girl and one boy* > participate. > - > > There is *no maximum limit* on the number of participants. > - > > Participation of *Buddies* should account for *10% of the branch’s > total strength*. > - > > Multiple Buddies can be from the *same batch/department*. > > [Click here to view the detailed Responsibilities of a Sunshine Buddy] > > > Looking forward to your enthusiastic participation. Please feel free to > reach out for any queries. > > Warm regards, > *Team Sunshine* > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Important: Add/Drop of Segment Courses (3-4, 3-6 Segment) – Deadline and Guidelines
body: Dear Students, This is to inform you that the *Add/Drop process for the following segment courses has commenced*: · 3-6 Segment · 3-4 Segment The *deadline for add/drop* will be as per the schedule provided in the screenshot below: *Course Drop Process: Students can drop courses using the "Course Registration" option only until 08th September 2025, while course registrations are open. From 09th September 2025 onwards, the "Course Drop" option must be used to drop 3-6 segment courses, as the deadline to drop 3-4 segment courses is 08th September 2025.* [image: image.png] However, please note the following important points: 1. *Late Registration Penalty*: o A penalty of *Rs. 500/- per day* will be imposed for not registering the course within the deadline, o Up to a maximum of *Rs. 5000/-*, o With approval from the *Course Instructor, FA/Guide, DPGC/DUGC, and HOD*. 2. *No Dropping After Deadline*: o Dropping of any course *will not be permitted* after the deadline under any circumstances. 3. *Course Eligibility*: o It is the *student’s responsibility* to ensure that they are *eligible* for the registered courses. o If any *ineligible course is not dropped* before the deadline, it will lead to an *‘Fail (F)’ grade*. o Please verify eligibility with the respective *Course Instructor or Department*. 4. *Upcoming Segment Courses ( 4-6 / 5-6)*: o These courses can be added or dropped during the *respective segment’s add/drop period* also. We request you to complete the add/drop process well before the deadline and avoid last-minute complications. *Thanks & Regards /सादर धन्यवाद* *Academic Section*/*शैक्षणिक अनुभाग* *Room No. G-003 / **कमरा नंबर जी-003,* *Administration Block / प्रशासन खंड,* *Kandi, Sangareddy/कंडी, संगारेड्डी* *Telangana/तेलंगाना - 502284* *Ph: 040 2301 6767 / 6065* ************************************ *Important **Links* *FAQ for students on Academic Matters * *FAQs for faculty on Academic matters * *Academic Handbook * *Courses of Study (Bachelors)* *Courses of Study (Masters & PhD)* -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: 📸 Join Camera Handling: 101 – Photography Basics for Freshers!
body: Dear Freshers, It’s time to focus! INFOCUS, in collaboration with the Media Council, is bringing you the ultimate first step into photography! ✨📸 Camera Handling: 101 is here! Want to click better photos, truly understand your camera, and start your journey into the world of photography? This session is designed just for you. Join us at, 🗓 Date: Wednesday, 3rd Sept 🕘 Time: 9:15 PM 📍 Venue: ALH1 What to Expect: ✨ Introduction to the basics of photography ✨ Hands-on camera handling and practice ✨ Simple tips to improve your shots ✨ Clear your doubts (yes, even the “what does this button do?” ones) Don’t miss it, see you there! subject: Re: Invitation to National Sports Day Celebration – 29th August 2025
body: Dear All, The exhibition hockey match which was cancelled on 29th August has been scheduled today. The match is going to be held at the old football ground from 5 30 PM, anyone who is interested to watch the match can join at 5 30, refreshments will be provided to everyone. Thanks & Regards, Kowsith Gurubilli. On Fri, 29 Aug, 2025, 16:09 Sports Faculty In-Charge, wrote: > Dear all, > > Due to unplayably wet conditions of the hockey ground, the exhibition > hockey game has been postponed to a later date. > > Apologies for any disappointment caused. > > Best regards, > Himanshu > > On Fri, Aug 29, 2025 at 5:50 AM Sports Faculty In-Charge < > fic.sports@iith.ac.in> wrote: > >> Happy National Sports day to all. >> >> Join the celebration by participating in the morning run starting at 6:30 >> AM at the SNCC. >> >> Later evening, enjoy an exhibition hockey game scheduled at 5:30 PM in >> fields near old hostel blocks. >> >> Best regards, >> Himanshu >> >> On Thu, Aug 28, 2025 at 10:18 AM Department of Sports, IIT Hyderabad < >> office.sports@iith.ac.in> wrote: >> >>> Dear All, >>> >>> Greetings from the Department of Sports! >>> >>> We are delighted to invite you to join us in celebrating *National >>> Sports Day* on *29th August 2025*, commemorating the birth anniversary >>> of the legendary hockey player *Major Dhyan Chand*. >>> >>> To mark the occasion, we have planned two exciting events: >>> >>> *🕕 Morning:* >>> *5 km Run* starting from *SNCC at 6:30 AM* >>> >>> *🌇 Evening:* >>> *Exhibition Hockey Match* at *5:30 PM* on the *Old Football Ground* >>> *Teams: Dhyan Chand vs Roop Chand* >>> >>> We encourage everyone to participate and celebrate the spirit of sports >>> under the theme: >>> *"Ek Ghanta Khel Ke Maidan Mein!!"* >>> (*One Hour on the Playground!*) >>> >>> The event will be followed by *refreshments*. >>> >>> Let’s come together to honour our sporting heritage and promote a >>> healthy, active lifestyle! >>> >>> As part of the *Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports, Government of India*, >>> this year’s National Sports Day celebration will include the following *official >>> taglines and hashtags*: >>> *(To be included below once finalized.)* >>> >>> Looking forward to your enthusiastic participation! >>> *Taglines* >>> • Ek ghanta khel ke maidan mein!! >>> • एक घंटा खेल के मैदान म�!! >>> >>> *Hashtags* >>> • #KhelegaDeshKhilegaDesh >>> • #NSD2025 >>> >>> Thanks & regards >>> >>> Vikram Pratap singh >>> >>> -- >>> >>> *धन्यवाद और सादर/Thanks & Regards,* >>> >>> >>> >>> *खेल विभाग Department of sportsभारतीय प्रौद्योगिकी संस्थान (IIT), >>> हैदराबाद* >>> *Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Hyderabad* >>> *Off. subject: Prof. Kiran (EE) and Prof. Krti (CHE) are elected as FNAE
body: Dear friends, I am delighted to share the good news that Prof. Kiran Kuchi (EE) and Prof. Kirti Chandra Sahu (CHE) are elected as Fellows of Indian National Academy of Engineering (FNAE) for this year. This is a great news to all of us. For an Engineer, becoming FNAE is a great honor, as INAE is the only Engineering Academy in India. On behalf of all of us, I would like to convey my hearty congratulations to both and their research groups. Wishing both of them many more laurels in near future. warm regards, Murty ************************************************ प्रो. बी.एस. मूर्ति/ Prof. B.S. Murty निदेशक/ Director भारतीय प्रौद्योगिकी संस्थान हैदराबाद, कंदी, संगारेड्डी-502284 Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad, Kandi, Sangareddy-502284 Email: bsm@iith.ac.in; director@iith.ac.in Phone: +91-40-2301 6002; +91-83310 36001 ************************************************ -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Meet ServiceNow 2025 | Mandatory Registration for September 8 Sessions
body: Dear Students, Greetings, We are excited to announce that *Meet ServiceNow 2025* will be hosted on *September 8, 2025*, featuring three engaging sessions for the *2027 graduating batch (B.Tech - *CS, IT & Circuit branches*)*. Session Details Session Time Duration Orientation 10:30 AM – 11:30 AM 60 mins Interview Readiness 11:50 AM – 12:35 PM 45 mins Networking (Exclusive) 2:00 PM – 2:45 PM 45 mins Compulsory Registration 1. *Orientation & Interview Readiness* All students attending these sessions must *compulsorily register* using the link below: 🔗 Register for Meet ServiceNow 2025 Orientation | IIT Hyderabad *Deadline:* *September 4, 2025* 2. *Networking Session (Exclusive)* Interested students must also fill the separate form below. A few will be selected for this exclusive session: 🔗 Register for Meet ServiceNow 2025 Networking Session *Deadline:* *September 4, 2025* We look forward to your enthusiastic participation in making this event a success. -- *Thanks and Regards,Shubham Nare* Internship Coordinator, Office of Career Services, Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad, Phone : +91 7249792394 Email : ic23btech11020@iith.ac.in -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: KRC: Invitation to USER AWARENESS WORKSHOP on Sage resources at KRC-Ground Floor-AVRoom-1 on 03-09-2025 (Wednesday) at 3.00 PM
body: Gentle Reminder > for tomorrow's *User Awareness Workshop *on *Sage* resources ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: IITH Library - KRC Date: Thu, Aug 28, 2025 at 5:59 PM Subject: KRC: Invitation to USER AWARENESS WORKSHOP on Sage resources at KRC-Ground Floor-AVRoom-1 on 03-09-2025 (Wednesday) at 3.00 PM *G**reetings from IITH-KRC (Library)!!!* *D**ear All,* IITH-KRC (Library) is happy to announce and cordially invite you to attend the below *User Awareness Workshop.* Please find the attachment for more details and Registration link. *IITH-KRC *in collaboration with *Sage**,* invites you to an *User Awareness Workshop *on *Sage* resources Venue: *KRC Ground Floor - AV Room-1* Date: 03-09-2025 (Wednesday) Time: 3.00 PM to 4.00 PM : Sage Journals Audiences: All faculty members, Research Scholars, and PG students **Project Muse & AAAS-Science - This session-1 is cancelled due to the medical emergency of the speaker. Future date will be intimated later.* *Registration: * Please confirm your participation by registering *on or before 03-09-2025* at Registration link: *Click here* *All faculty, research scholars and students are cordially invited to attend this event* सादर धन्यवाद | Thanks & Regards Bhojaraju Ph.D., MLISc, PGDLAN | Endeavour Research Fellow (Australia) ----------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------ -------------------------------------------------------- *Explore KRC: * *Website | Catalog |RAIITH |Pragyaan | E-Resources | Search * *Connect KRC: * LinkedIn | Facebook | X-Tweets | Instagram | YouTube *डॉ. भोजराजू **गुंजाल* / *Dr. Bhojaraju Gunjal *मुख्य पुस्तकालय अधिकारी / Chief Library Officer, ज्ञान संसाधन केंद्र / Knowledge Resource Centre (KRC-Library) भारतीय प्रौद्योगिकी संस्थान हैदराबाद, कंधी, संगारेड्डी-502284 *Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad*, Kandi, Sangareddy-502284. E-mail: bhojaraju.g@admin.iith.ac.in | librarian@iith.ac.in Phone: +91-40-23016085 (O) Connect: [image: ORCID] | [image: Scholar] | [image: BePress] | [image: Publications List] | [image: Publons] | [image: IRINS] | [image: Profile] ----------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------ -------------------------------------------------------- -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Re: Inter IIT Volleyball trials
body: Dear students, Today is going to be the final day of the volleyball trials, it is requested that everyone who are interested to be a part of the team shall join the trials today from 6-8 PM in SNCC Volleyball court *Thanks & Regards,Kowsith Gurubilli,* *Sports Secy, Student Gymkhana 25-26,* *Contact 8121181256* On Mon, 1 Sept, 2025, 10:33 Sports Secy, wrote: > Dear Students, > > Gentle reminder regarding the volleyball trials which are going to be held > at SNCC Volleyball court today and tomorrow from 6 to 8 PM, please be there > on time > > > *Thanks & Regards,Kowsith Gurubilli,* > *Sports Secy, Student Gymkhana 25-26,* > *Contact 8121181256* > > On Tue, 19 Aug, 2025, 21:50 Kowsith Gurubilli, < > sports_secy@gymkhana.iith.ac.in> wrote: > >> Dear Students, >> >> This is to inform you that the Pre-Selection Trials for the Inter-IIT >> Volleyball Team (Boys and Girls) will be conducted as per the schedule >> given below: >> >> Dates: 1st & 2nd September 2025 >> Venue: [SNCC Volleyball court] >> Time: [6:00 Pm to 8:00 pm] >> >> All interested students are requested to participate in the trials and >> report at the venue on time in proper sports attire.Kindly note that >> wearing non-marking shoes and a proper sports uniform is mandatory. >> >> For any further queries, kindly contact the volleyball coordinator >> (Boys)- Sai Dhanush (9110385131) >> Coordinator (Girls)-Namitha (70138 75348) >> >> >> *Thanks & Regards,Kowsith Gurubilli,* >> *Sports Secy, Student Gymkhana 25-26,* >> *Contact 8121181256* >> > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. subject: Re: Invitation to National Space Day – 02 Sept. 2025
body: Hi all, This is a gentle reminder for National Space Day Celebration today. Venue: LHC-5 Regards Manish On Thu, Aug 28, 2025, 12:10 Hod Physics wrote: > Dear All, > > We are pleased to inform you that a one-day program will be organized to > celebrate National Space Day on 02 September 2025, as declared by our > Hon’ble Prime Minister, to commemorate the historic Chandrayaan-3 Moon > landing—a remarkable achievement of Indian space scientists. > > We are honored to have Dr. V. Seshagiri Rao, Former Associate Director of > ISRO and Project Director of the Multi-Object Tracking Radar (MOTR), as our > Chief Guest. The National Remote Sensing Centre (NRSC), ISRO, has kindly > agreed to collaborate with us by developing and showcasing exhibits on this > occasion. Around 120 school participants are expected to attend the event. > > On behalf of the organizing team, we extend a cordial invitation to you to > grace the inaugural ceremony as per the following details: > Inauguration (LHC-05, Galileo, Lecture Hall Complex) > Inauguration Ceremony: 11 AM > Opening messages by the Director: 11:10-11:15 AM > Remarks by the guest of honour: 11:15-11:25 AM > Keynote talk by the Chief Guest and felicitations of guests: 11:25-12:10 AM > Award presentation by the Chief Guest for different competition winners: > 12:10-12:20 PM > Address and closing remarks by the HoD, Department of Physics: 12:20-12:30 > PM > > Exhibitions and competitions (LHC ground floor lobby and LHC-02) > 10:00-11:00 and 2:00-3:45 PM: Model and painting exhibitions by students > 2:00-3:45 PM: impromptu competition (LHC-02) > Prize distribution for winners: (3:45-4:00 PM) > > We look forward to your presence and your interaction with students during > the model displays, painting exhibitions, and impromptu competitions > planned for the day. Your participation will certainly inspire the > students and add immense value to this celebration of India’s remarkable > space achievements. > > Best Regards > Manish > > > *...........................................................................* > प्रो. मनीष निरंजन / Prof. Manish Niranjan > अध्यक्ष, भौतिकी विभाग / Head, Department of Physics > भारतीय प्रौद्योगिकी संस्थान हैदराबाद, कंदी, संगारेड्डी-502284 > Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad, Kandi, Sangareddy -502284 > तेलंगाना, भारत / Telangana, INDIA > > *........................................................................* > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: New announcement: "Your compulsory attendance record will…"
body: Notification settings CS5590/CS3390 New announcement Your compulsory attendance record will be here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MbtQExEpGCKP4FkRCr32PuQf2i8Cdw71_SjJXHkrGsg/edit?usp=sharing Please keep checking for updates. TO my surpirse, there are quite a few who started their score with negatives. They must be confident of acing the exams and hence can afford loosing easy marks. Gentle reminder for tonight's optional tutorial. 7pm-8:30pm. I hope atleast the CR/students who asked for optional tutorials. Turn up. See details Posted on 11:16 AM, Sep 2 (GMT+05:30) by Saketha Nath Jagarlapudi Google LLC 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043 USA This email was sent to you because you indicated that you'd like to receive email notifications from Google Classroom. If you don't want to receive emails like this, you can unsubscribe or change your settings .

subject: Fwd: Selection Trials for Inter IIT Team probables
body: Dear Students, FYI ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Mathew M Philip Date: Tue, 2 Sept, 2025, 11:10 Subject: Selection Trials for Inter IIT Team probables To: Kowsith Gurubilli Dear Students, We are excited to announce the trials for probables of forming the Men’s & Women's Basketball team for the upcoming Inter IIT Sports Meet scheduled to be held in the month of December at IIT Madras. The trials will be conducted under the guidance of our Coach Ms Ruchi Yadav and are open to all students. *Details of the Trials:* *Date:* 03.09.2025 *Time:* 7:00 pm to 8:30 pm *Venue:* SNCC Basketball Court *Dress Code*: Shorts & T-shirt *Sportswear* with *non-marking shoes* (Mandatory) The selected players will constitute the official Institute Basketball Team, which will represent our institute at the Inter IIT Sports Meet as well as in practice matches and other tournaments throughout the year. The team will also have daily training sessions to prepare for the upcoming tournaments. We encourage all interested students to participate to showcase their talent. This is a great opportunity to play competitive basketball and represent our institute. We sincerely invite you all on behalf of our coach and the old team members, and we look forward to your participation. Please note that the SNCC Basketball Court will be *reserved for Inter IIT team practice* from today (02.09.2025) until December, from *6:30 PM to 9:00 PM daily.* *For any queries, contact:* Mathew – 8089040111 Anjali – 9406815374 Best regards, Mathew M Philip Coordinator,Basketball IITH Thanks & Regards / सादर धन्यवाद Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM. -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Re: [Internship] Media.net | Senior Product Analyst Intern – Registration
body: Dear All, Due to multiple requests, the deadline has been extended until 4 pm today. Please note that no further extensions would be given. The schedule regarding the Online Assesment would be conveyed in due course of time. Best Regards Sarvesh Goyal On Sun, 31 Aug 2025, 21:54 Sarvesh Goyal, wrote: > Dear All, > Hope you are doing well. > > We are pleased to inform you that* Media.net *is visiting IIT Hyderabad > again and inviting applications for the role of *Senior Product > Analyst Intern* as part of the ongoing internship drive. Do make best use > of the opportunity. > Further details are available on the *OCS portal.* > > *Deadline* *to register: 11:59 PM, September 1st, 2025* > > Interested and eligible students must register on the OCS portal before > the deadline. *All the further information will be made and conveyed > through this email thread only.* > > Warm Regards, > > *Sarvesh Goyal* > Internship Coordinator, OCS > Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad > Phone: +91-92852-83563 > > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Re: Internship Opportunity – BNY Mellon
body: Prior registration before 5:30 pm today will be considered and will receive the test link Thanks On Mon, 1 Sep 2025 at 4:47 PM, Manav Rathi wrote: > Dear Students, > > Please find below the details for the upcoming BNY Online Assessment. > Kindly go through all the instructions carefully and complete prior > registration. > > Test Details: > > > - > > Date: 2nd September 2025 > - > > Test Login Window: 6:30 PM to 6:50 PM IST (You must log in within this > window to appear for the test) > - > > Test Duration: 2 Hours 30 Minutes > - > > Prior Registration Link (Mandatory – apply latest by 1st Sept 2025): > > https://eofe.fa.us2.oraclecloud.com/hcmUI/CandidateExperience/en/sites/CX_1001/job/67344/?utm_medium=jobshare&utm_source=External+Job+Share > > - > > Test Link: https://hr.gs/bnytest2 > - > > Password: bny2025 (use this while logging into the test, not your > Windows password) > > > Important Instructions: > > > 1. > > The test link will be active only during your allotted login window. > 2. > > Do not attempt to login/start before the allotted time – it will lead > to disqualification. > 3. > > Webcam must remain ON throughout the test. > 4. > > Read all test instructions carefully before starting. > 5. > > Keep a resume (soft copy) ready for upload before the test. > 6. > > Keep Aadhar Card and PAN Card (hard or soft copy) handy. > 7. > > Test will be monitored by a physical proctor/invigilator from the > Placement Team > > Wishing you all the very best for the assessment! > > Regards, > > Manav Rathi > > Internship Coordinator > > > > On Tue, 26 Aug 2025 at 10:10 PM, Manav Rathi > wrote: > >> Hey all , >> >> Final reminder to Register before the deadline >> >> Regards >> Manav Rathi >> >> On Tue, 26 Aug 2025 at 10:26 AM, Manav Rathi >> wrote: >> >>> Hey all , >>> >>> This is a gentle reminder to register on OCS portal before the deadline . >>> >>> Regards >>> Manav Rathi >>> >>> >>> On Sat, 23 Aug 2025 at 3:14 PM, Manav Rathi >>> wrote: >>> >>>> Dear Batchmates, >>>> >>>> I am pleased to inform you that *BNY Mellon* will be visiting our >>>> campus as part of the OCS Internship Drive for the role of *Software >>>> Development Intern*. >>>> >>>> Interested and eligible students are requested to register on the OCS >>>> portal before the deadline: *26th August, 11:59 PM*. >>>> >>>> For any queries, feel free to reach out to me. >>>> >>>> Best regards, >>>> *Manav Rathi* >>>> Internship Coordinator >>>> Office of Career Services >>>> 7878342142 >>>> >>> -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Announcement of PG Class Representatives (CR's) (2025–26)
from: "''PG Representative' via Students, IIT Hyderabad' via Students, IIT Hyderabad" <students@iith.ac.in>
body: Dear Students, We are pleased to announce the results of the recently conducted PG Class Representative elections for the academic year *2025–26*. Department Representatives Additive manufacturing KOILADA BINDU MADHAVA Artificial Intelligence Sneh Sourabh Bio Medical Engineering Joel Mathew James Bio Technology Devak Shah Chemical Engineering Prajwal Civil Engineering Vemula Pranay Climate Change Peela Bala Anthony Kushal Computer Science and Engineering Divyansh Sevta (NIS) Computer Science and Engineering Jay Pokale Design Srijita Ghosh (Visual Design) Electrical Engineering Dorsela Keerthi Chandrika (Communication and Signal Processing Learning) Electrical Engineering Abdul Aleem Ahmed Sabihuddin (PowerElectronics and Power Systems) Electrical Engineering Joel Giby(Microelectronics and VLSI) Entrepreneurship and Management Samhita M Kiran (Techno Entrepreneurship) Greenko School of Sustainability Krishna Gaur(Sustainable engineering ) Greenko School of Sustainability Manikanteswar reddy (E-waste Resource Engineering Management) Greenko School of Sustainability Anshu Rajput (E-waste Resource Engineering Management ) Integrated Circuits and Microsystem Packaging Mohammad Abdul Aleem Hazari Lightweight Engineering Kartikeya Arpan Desai Materials Science and Metallurgical Engineering Malothu Chandrashekar Mathematics Gunmay Singla Mechanical & Aerospace Engineering SOUMYA RANJAN SUTAR (Integrated Design and Manufacturing) Mechanical & Aerospace Engineering Vikram Kumar Anand (Robotics and intelligence system) Mechanical & Aerospace Engineering Sanjai V (Aerospace Engineering) Medical Device Innovation Kailash Sathya Narayanan MSc Physics Shivanshu Pandey Opthalmic Engineering Mohana Krishnan H Physics Manpreet Singh Monga (Quantum and Solid State Devices) Smart Mobility Manish More We would like to congratulate all the elected CRs and wish them the very best for their tenure. The role of a CR is crucial in bridging communication between students and the institute, and we are confident that the newly elected representatives will take forward the responsibilities with sincerity and dedication. *All shortlisted students are requested to kindly reply to this same mail thread with their WhatsApp contact details for further communication.* On behalf of the student body, We also thank everyone who participated in the election process and contributed to making it smooth and fair. Looking forward to working together for the betterment of our PG community. *______________________________* *Thanks and Regards,* *KIRITHIKA K S & V V S R SAI SASHANK* *Postgraduate Representatives* *Students Gymkhana 2025-2026* -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Your HackerRank FY26 | Cisco Day - Online Assessment | Summer Internship | 03 Sep 2025 Invitation
body: FY26 | Cisco Day - Online Assessment | Summer Internship | 03 Sep 2025 - powered by HackerRank Hi, Thank you for your interest in joining Cisco Systems Inc! We're excited to invite you to the next step in the process: the HackerRank FY26 | Cisco Day - Online Assessment | Summer Internship | 03 Sep 2025 assessment. This is a great opportunity to showcase your skills, and we're here to support you along the way. Here's what you need to know: Timeline: Please complete the assessment within 7 calendar days, or as discussed with your recruiter. Practice Makes Perfect: To help you feel confident, we've included a sample test where you can explore the HackerRank environment and practice before starting the official test. A few tips for success: Create the Right Environment: Set up in a quiet, private space where you can focus. Understand Each Question: Take a moment to carefully read each question before diving in. Avoid Disruptions: Once you start, complete the test in one uninterrupted session. Avoid refreshing your browser or using the back button to prevent losing progress. Feel free to reach out to your recruiter if you have any questions. Wishing you the best of luck with the assessment—go show us your skills! Happy coding, The Cisco Systems Inc Hiring Team Recommended Browser: Google Chrome v101 or greater Duration: 90 min Start Login Date/Time: 3 Sep 2025 08:00 PM IST (Asia - Kolkata) End Login Date/Time: 3 Sep 2025 08:35 PM IST (Asia - Kolkata) Start Test You can also use this test link to access the test anytime before the test expiry date above. Please check date and time in your time zone. Please note once you begin the test the timer will start and the test cannot be paused. Hence it is highly recommended that you complete the test in one sitting. In case of power failure or loss of internet connection, the test timer will continue to run even though you might not be attempting it, in such a case please contact us by replying back to this email. For any technical queries, please refer to https://track.pstmrk.it/3ts/candidatesupport.hackerrank.com%2Fhc%2Fen-us%2Fcategories%2F4402828710675-FAQ/EDcI/67_-AQ/AQ/c50f5f80-e51d-4161-b764-6c3b9e0073be/5/Pd8INbm8r6 or contact us at https://track.pstmrk.it/3ts/customersupport.hackerrank.com%2Fhc%2Fen-us%2Frequests%2Fnew%3Fticket_form_id%3D360001035834./EDcI/67_-AQ/AQ/c50f5f80-e51d-4161-b764-6c3b9e0073be/7/ygQ1IwAy1V HackerRank only provides a platform to conduct the tests. It does not schedule or evaluate any hiring tests or conduct interviews for any company. Hence for any of the above requests please contact the company that sent you the invite.

Re: Internship Opportunity – BNY Mellon
body: Dear Students, Please find below the details for the upcoming BNY Online Assessment. Kindly go through all the instructions carefully and complete prior registration. Test Details: - Date: 2nd September 2025 - Test Login Window: 6:30 PM to 6:50 PM IST (You must log in within this window to appear for the test) - Test Duration: 2 Hours 30 Minutes - Prior Registration Link (Mandatory – apply latest by 1st Sept 2025): https://eofe.fa.us2.oraclecloud.com/hcmUI/CandidateExperience/en/sites/CX_1001/job/67344/?utm_medium=jobshare&utm_source=External+Job+Share - Test Link: https://hr.gs/bnytest2 - Password: bny2025 (use this while logging into the test, not your Windows password) Important Instructions: 1. The test link will be active only during your allotted login window. 2. Do not attempt to login/start before the allotted time – it will lead to disqualification. 3. Webcam must remain ON throughout the test. 4. Read all test instructions carefully before starting. 5. Keep a resume (soft copy) ready for upload before the test. 6. Keep Aadhar Card and PAN Card (hard or soft copy) handy. 7. Test will be monitored by a physical proctor/invigilator from the Placement Team Wishing you all the very best for the assessment! Regards, Manav Rathi Internship Coordinator On Tue, 26 Aug 2025 at 10:10 PM, Manav Rathi wrote: > Hey all , > > Final reminder to Register before the deadline > > Regards > Manav Rathi > > On Tue, 26 Aug 2025 at 10:26 AM, Manav Rathi > wrote: > >> Hey all , >> >> This is a gentle reminder to register on OCS portal before the deadline . >> >> Regards >> Manav Rathi >> >> >> On Sat, 23 Aug 2025 at 3:14 PM, Manav Rathi >> wrote: >> >>> Dear Batchmates, >>> >>> I am pleased to inform you that *BNY Mellon* will be visiting our >>> campus as part of the OCS Internship Drive for the role of *Software >>> Development Intern*. >>> >>> Interested and eligible students are requested to register on the OCS >>> portal before the deadline: *26th August, 11:59 PM*. >>> >>> For any queries, feel free to reach out to me. >>> >>> Best regards, >>> *Manav Rathi* >>> Internship Coordinator >>> Office of Career Services >>> 7878342142 >>> >> -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. body: Dear all This is a kind reminder that the Ganesh Nimarjan Celebration will be held today, 1st September 2025. We will begin with the last* Aarthi, *followed by the *Nimarjan* at 4:30 PM. We warmly invite you all to join in the pooja, devotion, and *celebration* as we bid farewell to Lord Ganesha together. Details: 📅 Date: 1st September 2025 🕟 Time: 4:30 PM 📍 Venue: new hostels near chai Amruth Looking forward to your presence. from: "'Finance and Consulting Club IIT Hyderabad' via Students, IIT Hyderabad" <students@iith.ac.in>
body: Dear Students, Gentle reminder to fill up the form for the Quant domain. The form closes on *3rd September, 11:59 PM*. Link to apply: https://forms.gle/8Y9BCF6DyV59d7XJA *Thanks and Regards,* *Team FCC,* *Finance and Consulting Club,* IIT Hyderabad fcc@gymkhana.iith.ac.in | IIT Hyderabad On Tue, Aug 26, 2025 at 3:15 AM Finance and Consulting Club IIT Hyderabad < fcc@gymkhana.iith.ac.in> wrote: > Dear Students, > > We are delighted to announce the launch of the *Quantitative Finance > Domain* under the Finance & Consulting Club. This initiative is designed > to foster a strong quant culture on campus by creating structured > opportunities to explore, learn, and apply concepts in quantitative > finance, trading, and analytics. > > *What this new domain brings to you:* > > - > > *Mentorship from Industry Experts:* Learn directly from professionals > in the quantitative finance space, with opportunities to gain referrals for > top quant roles. > - > > *Guidance from Seniors:* Benefit from mentorship by seniors who have > successfully secured roles at leading firms such as Quadeye, 26 Miles > Capital, and Goldman Sachs. > - > > *Profile Building through Real Projects:* Work on live industrial > projects (two already lined up!) to strengthen your resume and gain > hands-on experience. > - > > *Preparation for Prestigious Hackathons:* Receive dedicated support > and mentorship to participate in leading quantitative finance competitions. > > We have attached a document along with this email with details about our > new domain. > > If you are interested in being part of this exciting new initiative, > please fill out the form below: > *Apply Here: *https://forms.gle/8Y9BCF6DyV59d7XJA > > We look forward to your enthusiastic participation and to building this > new chapter of the Finance & Consulting Club together. > *Thanks and Regards,* > > *Team FCC,* > > *Finance and Consulting Club,* > > IIT Hyderabad > > fcc@gymkhana.iith.ac.in | IIT Hyderabad > > -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. subject: Final Shortlist for ATF
body: Greetings from AlgoUniversity! We are pleased to share with you the list of students from your institute who have met the attendance criteria for the ATF 2025 Induction Session. All these students are now shortlisted for *Stage 1 of the ATF Coding Test*, scheduled on *September 21, 2025 and September 22, 2025**.* Exact slots will be communicated shortly. ------------------------------ *ATF Stage 1 Coding Test – Overview* - Duration: 90 minutes - Sections & Marks: - Mathematical Aptitude & Reasoning – 80 marks - Data Structures & Algorithms – 120 marks - Proctoring: AI-based video + audio, strict monitoring ------------------------------ *Rules & Instructions* - Languages Allowed: C, C++, Java, Python - Scoring: No partial scoring — only fully correct solutions will be awarded marks - Exam Integrity: Strict plagiarism checks in place; tab switching, external compilers, AI tools, or peer assistance are strictly prohibited - Proctoring Requirements: Test is AI-proctored — students must keep camera and microphone on throughout - Device: Laptop/desktop with stable internet; mobile devices not permitted - Disqualification: Any malpractice will lead to immediate disqualification ------------------------------ *Additional Notes* - These instructions are aligned with the coding test practices of leading tech companies (Google, Amazon, Microsoft, Oracle, etc.) - Students are advised to log in 15 minutes early for system checks. ------------------------------ For any clarifications, feel free to reach out to our team at support@algouniversity.zohodesk.in or chat with us *HERE * Thanks & Regards, Arin Aggarwal Career Cell Manager Office of Career Services, IIT Hyderabad Cell~ +91 7087850215 -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.

subject: Invitation for Ganesh Nimarjan – 1st September 2025
body: Dear Students, We are glad to inform you that the *Nimarjan of Lord Ganesha* will be held on 1st September 2025. As part of the celebrations, we will have the *last Aarthi* tomorrow evening, followed by the Nimarjan at *4:30 PM.* We warmly invite everyone to join us for the pooja and take part in the festivities, devotion, and joy of this occasion. Let us come together as one community to bid farewell to Lord Ganesha with prayers and celebration. Details: 📅 Date: 1st September 2025 🕟 Time: 4:30 PM 📍 Venue: new hostels near chai Amruth All are welcome! Jai Bappa Morya 🙏 Thanks & Regards ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ *Krishna Vardhan Pitla* *General Secretary-I* *Student Gymkhana 2025-26* *Mobile: ** 7989400829* -- Disclaimer:- This footer text is to convey that this email is sent by one of the users of IITH. So, do not mark it as SPAM.
